review:
I have 3 echoes in the house, 2 of them can use this skill with some degree of efficiency, but the other one . . . that one must hate sports.  Can't find schedules, scores or much of anything.  Weird, right?
The two that work do ok, it does take some arguing to get the information I want.  "Alexa, ask March Madness when LSU is scheduled to play."
"I can't find a team called LSU"
"Alexa, ask March Madness what games are scheduled"
She gives a list and asks if there is a particular team I'm interested in . . . smh
I tell her LSU, and she tells me they play tomorrow (which is accurate).
Like most Alexa skills, this one needs work.

name: Surf Checker
description:
THE ROCK WAS ADDED AND MOST CALIFORNIA AND HAWAII SURF SPOTS ARE AVAILABLE!

Let Alexa give you the surf report for most California and Hawaii surf spots.  Also for each surf spot, let Alexa also give you the tide report, the water temperature and let you know when is the best day to surf for the upcoming week.

Using the streamlined commands structure, getting the surf report information for several spots is simple and easy.  

Here are examples to try: 
 
"Alexa, Ask Surf Checker for Salt Creek on Tuesday"
"When is the best day to surf Lowers"
"What is the tide report for San Clemente State Beach on Wednesday"
"What is the water temperature at Lihaina Harbor"
"When is the best day to surf Pipeline"

For surf reports, just say the surf spot name for quick results:
For example, just say "Sunset Beach" for the Sunset Beach surf report. Or say, "Sunset Beach on Thursday" to get the report for the upcoming Thursday.        

Alexa also remembers the last surf report you requested so that additional reports do not have to include the spot name.   For example once you ask for a report like:
"What is the surf report for Pismo Beach Pier"

You can get the tide, water temperature, and best day to surf at Pismo Beach Pier by saying:
"What is the tide report" or just "tide report?"
"When is the best day to surf"
"What is the water temperature" or just "water temperature"

If you want to find the tide activity later in the week for Pismo Beach just say:
"Tide report for tomorrow" or "Tide report on Friday"

Listed below are JUST SOME of the surf spots available.  There were too many to list here.  The complete list is at www.surfncircuits.com.  New locations soon!!   If you want your surf spot added please mention it in comment below or at www.surfncircuits.com

name: The Rookie's Guide to the NFL
description:
The Rookie's Guide to the NFL is your official way to learn about the National Football League. Become an expert by asking about the rules, penalties, scoring plays, commentator lingo, previous Super Bowls, team formations, and more.

After enabling the skill, say 'Open NFL' or 'Launch NFL' to use The Rookie's Guide.

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.
review: I was unhappy to find that after paying for my subscription, I was still unable to listen to live games. Alexa acted as though she would play the live audio, but was only able to tell me which teams were playing. I don't recommend this app because all the features I paid for were no different than the included "free" features.

name: Columbia River Fish Counts
description:
This skill provides yesterday's fish counts over Columbia River Dams and Willamette falls in the Pacific Northwest.

To ask for the skill, ask Alexa:
"Alexa,launch fish counts"
"get fish counts for <location>".

For example, to get yesterday's fish numbers over Bonneville Dam, just ask:
"Alexa,launch fish counts" 
"get counts for Bonneville Dam"

You can also get a list of locations by asking:
"list locations"

name: ADVrider.com (Unofficial) Dakar 2019 News
description:
The Dakar Rally is an annual rally raid organised by the Amaury Sport Organisation. Most events since the inception in 1978 were from Paris, France, to Dakar, Senegal, but due to security threats in Mauritania, which led to the cancellation of the 2008 rally, races since 2009 have been held in South America.

The 2019 Rally runs from 6 January 2019 -  17 January 2019. It covers 5,000 km of racing over 10 stages. 

ADVrider.com has been the internet's number one resource for adventure motorcycling on the internet for over a decade. Our team in South America is following the rally on the ground.

Subscribe to get the latest Dakar news and stage results.
comment heading: This a great addition to a site that's already pretty darn good.
review: Dakar coverage from the race itself is a treat. I've read the stuff the reporter has done and she's on the ball.

name: Running Clothes
description:
Wondering what to wear on your next run? 
The Running Clothes Advisor takes the guesswork out of getting dressed for your next outdoor run based on your local weather conditions. This simple guide may prompt you to enable location permissions in your Alexa app. If you do not wish to enable location permissions say, "My Inputs" for your personalized apparel recommendation.

Our exclusive apparel algorithm provides personalized apparel recommendations based on weather conditions and gender. This skill has been optimized with screen support for Echo Show and Echo Spot devices.

After your run, re-open the Running Clothes advisor and select "log my run." You can record your miles ran and how your run went. You can also tell Alexa if her recommendation was too hot or too cold and the algorithm will automatically adjust your recommendations going forward.

If you choose apparel advice based current weather conditions, Alexa will pull temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other weather conditions based on your zip code. Alexa will prompt you for your gender and create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive apparel algorithm. Our exclusive algorithm is based on years of running experience and races including 5K, 10K, 10 Miler, Half Marathon, and Full Marathon distances. Caroline Dunn is a New York City Marathon 2018 Finisher.

If you select running outfit advice based on your inputs, Alexa will ask you for your gender, temperature, weather conditions (sunny, windy, cloudy, or raining), and your run intensity (easy run, or race), to create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive algorithm. Feel free to adjust based on your personal preference. This is only intended to be a guide.

Disclaimer: Please consult a physician before beginning a new workout program.

Created by: Caroline Dunn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinedunn/
https://twitter.com/thecarolinedunn
https://www.instagram.com/thecarolinedunn/
http://carolinedunn.org/
http://alexadevgroup.com/

"Alexa, Start calling the hogs and beat Alabama"
review: I am an ardent Razorback fan; this has the correct words but sounds nothing like a genuine Hog Call.

name: Unofficial NFL News Reader
description:
It's the football season and this is the unofficial skill to stay informed with latest NFL news for your favorite football team. Just invoke the skill and provide your favorite football team's name to get their latest news. 
Please note that it is recommended to provide the complete team name to get accurate results eg: Los Angeles Rams would be recommended over LA.

name: TigerNet
description: Welcome to the TigerNet.com Alexa Skill!  You may ask TigerNet for the latest headline.  More functions will be added soon!
review: Woohooahoo!!

name: Tennis News
description: A daily news briefing on every aspect of Men's Tennis from all around the globe. ATP Tennis News has access to every press conference, every match and much more besides.  Listen to get your fix on the world of Tennis.
review: I love the news, it is updated often and is very informational. However, there aren't any women's updates! Please add some!

name: 92.3 The Fan
description: The sports news that matters to Cleveland sports fans from 92.3 The Fan
review: i just looked it up under Alexia’s skills, added it, and played it within 30 seconds.

name: ESPN Radio (via TuneIn)
description: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest sports news from the ESPN Radio SportsCenter.
review: Way too loud. Thought it was going to blow my Echo's speaker.

name: E.P.L Matchday
description: The E.P.L Match Day skill will keep you up to date on scheduled fixtures, results for matches for the current day which have concluded and live scores if the match is currently in progress.
review: Who play first in the morning

name: Jammin' Jon's Wrestling News.
description: Need your daily dose of what's going on in the WWE, TNA, ROH, NJPW, and the Indies? Don't want to check the dirtsheets? Leave it up to Jammin' Jon! He will provide you every single day with the latest news in Professional Wrestling. Don't miss out on this! It's better than a bodyslam!
review: This is a great place to get wrestling news, recaps, rumors, etc... from someone who has a genuine heart for both wrestling and broadcasting.  I enjoy getting both the news and glimpses behind the personal scenes of the host each day.  Thanks for the updates and being able to show your passion for the sport and broadcasting.

name: Dodgers Baseball Fan Trivia
description:
Dodgers Fan Trivia was amassed by a long time avid fan of the Los Angeles Dodgers. This skill is fun to play during the long winter months when there is no baseball and you long to hear "It's time for Dodgers baseball". Or while waiting for the game to start while listening or watching at home.

Dodgers Fan Trivia is great for the entire family. Play with or against each other and see who really knows their Dodgers.

New trivia is constantly being added to the skill so keep coming back and playing.

If you have questions or comments please let us know:
TriviaSkills@dwilsys.com.

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Major League Baseball or the Los Angels Dodgers. This is a fan created game.

name: Lebron's Latest Tweet
description:
LEBRON JAMES + LAKERS FANS! Just say Alexa, open Lebron's latest tweet, and she'll read you the latest tweet from @KingJames. 

Help us make this Skill better, give us 5 stars in the Skill Store!

Enjoy!
review: great information

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to get: 
– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– your team’s injury/bye status. 
– player scores and injury updates.
All without ever putting your hands on the ball.

——

NOTE: This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em.
review: I first reviewed it thinking it didn't work but you have to say "Alexa Open Yahoo Fantasy Football" and it works.

name: New England Patriots
description:
Meet the Patriots!

Say “Alexa, open Patriots” to hear daily news updates, discover fun facts, and learn about coming to a game at Gillette Stadium.

You may ask:
What's new with the Patriots?
Play Patriots Radio.
What time is the game?
What is the Patriots schedule?
Tell me a fun fact about the Patriots.
Can bring a blanket to the game?
review: Highly recommend!

name: Audio Goal
description: Celebrate a goal - or anything else - with a classic audio "GOOOOOL" sound.  Try different languages too (Currently supports French and Spanish)

name: ESPN Radio (via TuneIn)
description: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest sports news from the ESPN Radio SportsCenter.
review: The volume is WAY too high on this flash briefing. It's obnoxious enough that I'm removing it. One would think they would get this simple item correct.

name: PGA TOUR
description: We can make it: Keep up to date on the latest scores from every PGA TOUR event throughout the season.  Ask Alexa for the latest leaderboard or get the score of your favorite player.  See more information here: https://www.pgatour.com/products/voiceassistant.html
comment heading: Works great if you ask you question properly. Follow the direction for the skill.
review: This skill work great if you follow the direction and ask the question properly.  Say "Alexa, ask PGA TOUR the leader board"  You must say "ask PGA TOUR" in order to activate the skill.  I have accessed the leader board for today's tournament, checked Fed Ex Cup standings and gotten info about various players.

name: New England Patriots
description:
Meet the Patriots!

Say “Alexa, open Patriots” to hear daily news updates, discover fun facts, and learn about coming to a game at Gillette Stadium.

You may ask:
What's new with the Patriots?
Play Patriots Radio.

review: This is an awesome skill.  I’ve already noticed it getting smarter and smarter as time goes on.  The “what’s new with the patriots?” feature is great, I check in with them everyday.

name: Golf Lifestyle
description: Golf Lifestyle is an ever growing skill that will allow you to discover some golfing insights that you might not have seen before.
review: This is a handy skill.  I like the fact it has quotes and demystifying myths and especially like the mindset tips.  Mindset is so important in this game.  I think this is good for pre-game listening.  Highly recommend.

name: The Capitals
description:
The Official Alexa Skill of the Washington Capitals
 
Looking for player stats? The upcoming schedule? The score of the game happening right now? The official Capitals Skill is the best way to get all of this information and much more using Alexa. You can even Unleash the Fury and play our goal song! Don't forget that Caps Radio 24/7 and every Washington Capitals game is available on Alexa.
Start by saying, “Alexa, open the Capitals.”
 
Created by Monumental Sports & Entertainment

skills-rest: Impossibly Hard Major League Baseball Quiz
name: Impossibly Hard Major League Baseball Quiz
description:
This skill quizzes you on a whole bunch of baseball records. These questions range from standard records to extremely obscure records. You'll be asked five questions at one time. You can play again simply by saying "play again". Right now, there are about twenty total questions (so four games), but we will be a adding more weekly. 

It's not meant to be beaten. It's meant to beat YOU down! I will constantly be adding new and more obscure questions. If you don't want feel badly about how little you really know about baseball, don't take this quiz. If you do take it, please don't blame me.
review:
Fun game with potential but some early issues:

1. There is like 12 total questions in the entire library

2. At least one incorrect fact, Satchel Paige is the oldest pitcher to ever appear in a game, not Moyer.

3. The answers are always in the same order and the same 4 choices, too predictable

name: NHL Flash Briefing
description:
Updated daily by NHL Network studio hosts, the Official NHL Flash Briefing delivers news and game recaps to your Alexa enabled device.

Start by saying, “Alexa, What’s the latest news?" or "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?

Created by the National Hockey League

name: Jammin' Jon's Wrestling News.
description: Need your daily dose of what's going on in the WWE, TNA, ROH, NJPW, and the Indies? Don't want to check the dirtsheets? Leave it up to Jammin' Jon! He will provide you every single day with the latest news in Professional Wrestling. Don't miss out on this! It's better than a bodyslam!
review: Knows his stuff and is a true fan. wish the older episodes would automatically delete like all other flash briefings. I always have to skip over episodes ive already listened to. great information, love the southern charm. keep it up!

name: Houston Baseball
description:
For fans of Houston Astros baseball who want to know their latest score, their next game, their standings, or how they've been doing lately (are they on a winning streak (oh yeah!) or a rough patch (oh no)). 

Ask the Astros baseball skill "how have they been doing?" or "what is their record" or even "when is their next game?" Stay up to date with the Houston Astros no matter if you live inside the 610 Loop or far away.

name: 49ers Update - Powered by 30sec
description: The official skill of the San Francisco 49ers. Hear all of the latest news and updates about the 49ers directly from the coaches, players, and executives. Just enable the skill and tell Alexa "give me 49ers update in 30sec.
review: I can quote the examples and it doesn't work. At all.

name: Houston Texans Flash Briefing
description: With the Houston Texans Flash Briefing, you’ll get weekly updates on the latest news for the Texans!
review: it hasn't updated if 3 weeks!  i font care about our 9 game win streak coming to an end! give us more news than that

name: Harsha says
description: For all the cricket fans out there Trendbreaker Skills Brings the masterpieces of commentary by Harsha Bhogle. Just say "Alexa, open Harsha says"
comment heading: I don't even watch Cricket, but now I might start!
review: Funnier than US Presidents.

name: Golf Lifestyle
description: Golf Lifestyle is an ever growing skill that will allow you to discover some golfing insights that you might not have seen before.
comment heading: This skill helps eliminate myths about golf!
review: I liked this skill because I'm new to golf and it is helpful in learning some important facts about the game.

name: NCAA March Madness
description:
NCAA March Madness for Alexa delivers real-time tournament scores, schedules, information about your Bracket Picks, and live radio for each game.

Example Phrases:

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games are on right now?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's scores.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's schedule.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games can I listen to on the radio?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for the score of the North Carolina game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness to play the Duke versus Kentucky game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what time the Kansas game starts.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness how my bracket is doing.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness who I picked to win it all.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness which teams I picked today.”

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.
review: Can't give me the schedule for the UConn women's game!  Really?

name: Metcon Workouts
description:
MetCon® Nutrition is committed to creating Innovative; All Natural, Paleo Friendly, Pharmacist, and Athlete designed Sports Nutrition Supplements focused on Increasing muscle Endurance, Speed, Power and overall Performance. We produce the most effective Sports Nutrition supplements without any fillers, artificial sweeteners, flavors or colors.

MetCon® Nutrition Supplements are made to deliver concentrated nutrients at specific times of exercise to help Athletes push themselves to their optimal performance limits to get the most out of their training, races, and competitions. MetCon® is designed to optimize Conditioning, CrossFit, Triathlons, MMA, Team Sports, Interval Weight Training and any other activities requiring increased Muscle Endurance.

MetCon Nutrition's founder, Dan Cox, has over a decade of experience in the Nutrition and Healthy Beverage industries.

Cox talks regularly on this podcast / flash briefing about how to maximize your fitness and nutrition.
review: Easy to listen, remember and get started with my dialy workout.

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league.

– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.

——

NOTE: This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em.
review: What an easy way to check my scores while games were in progress.  I love just asking my Echo for an update without having to take my eyes off the game.  If only the Chargers would start playing as well as this, I'd be a happy man!

name: IPL Cricket
description:
App for Live Score Updates of IPL T20 2017.
Ask Alexa, "Ask IPL T Twenty what is the score" or "Ask IPL T Twenty score".
It provides the latest score of the current running match.
If no match is running it will tell the upcoming IPL Match.

skills-rest: Real Runs - Running Tips for Runners
name: Real Runs - Running Tips for Runners
description: Discover how to be like the fittest and healthiest runners in the world with only small changes. We give you scientifically-tested running tips from famous running coaches like Bill Bowerman, Terrence Mahon, Jack Daniels, Joan Benoit, Clyde Hart, and others.  This briefing will help you naturally improve your runs, from beginners to more advanced runners. We will guide you to get more energy for runs and show you the secrets that top runners share with each other, including Olympic athletes.  Our daily dose will make you a better runner and help you optimize your runs.  Caution: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.  Please consult a doctor before starting a running workout.
review: I like that this app adds value to my running program and knowledge. I get good tips on the actual run plus supplementing it with the correct eating habits.

name: Telemundo Deportes
description: The Telemundo Deportes update brings you a recap of the sports news of the day. Add the Telemundo Deportes Update to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account. After adding the Telemundo Deportes Update, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest update play in Spanish.
review: Same news every day? It keeps in saying the soccer match between Argentina amd Israel was canceled. That happened 6 days ago. No update info provided. This is a dead skill.

name: F1nfo
description:
Currently offers when the next Grand Prix is taking place and where it is. More to come!
Formula 1 car icon by Hea Poh Lin from the Noun Project

name: Formula One Race Information - Unofficial
description:
The Pole Position provides information about this season's Formula one race results and standings from unofficial sources. 
You can say things like:
"Ask Pole Position when is the next race" or
"Ask Pole Position who won the last race" or
"Ask Pole Position for driver standings" or
"Ask Pole Position for constructor cup standings" or
"Ask Pole Position who won the race in Spain"
comment heading: Alexa, ask Pole Position who won the race.
review: Works as described, and it is up to date pretty fast. One request: Please make it able to set a reminder or alarm for the next race.

name: Coach Harbaugh
description:
Need to get fired up? Of course you don't - you are already attacking today with an enthusiasm unknown to mankind. But how about having your own personal Jim Harbaugh to entertain you on game day? Or on Mondays. Or every single morning while you wash down your steak breakfast with whole milk. 

You can say:
1. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh for a quote
2. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh to play "The Victors"
3. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh WHO'S GOT IT BETTER THAN US!?

Please note that this skill is not affiliated with the University of Michigan in any way. I'm just a fan with the constitutional right to share Jim Harbaugh's wisdom with you.

Special thanks to Sibish Basheer for making this possible.
review: ...but if I had words I would say that no other skill gets my wheels turning more than hearing the legend. Go Blue! And thank you to whoever developed this skill.

name: Champions League
description: Get the standings for each group in the Champions League.
review: Champions LEAGUE!!!

name: Arizona Sports 98.7 FM - Starting Five
description: Listen to Arizona Sports 98.7 FM's Doug and Wolf start each morning with the five biggest stories in sports.
review: Doug and Wolf are the only thing you need for Phoenix sports and Paul's Call at 9:45 with Paul Calvisi can't be missed.

name: Montreal Canadiens Trivia
description: This Montreal Canadiens Hockey Trivia Game contains tons of questions with multiple choice answers that you can pick from. The game will ask 5 questions and keep track of how many you answer correctly.

You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Mavs' current conference standing!
review:
October 18, 2018 - I enabled this skill and tried to listen to Mavs news after the season opener last night. The only news available was regarding Calderon and Manta Ellis. Those players haven’t been in a Mavs rosters for years!
What a waste of time ... especially for a MFFL trying to get the local scoop.

name: NFL in :60
description:
The NFL in :60 is your official daily NFL news update on the top stories from around the League. From the latest headlines to the NFL storylines you need to know on your favorite team and playmakers. Multiple updates throughout the day keep you up to speed on all the latest, straight from the NFL Network News Desk.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move NFL in :60 to the top of your news brief!

After enabling NFL in :60, you can say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's the news?" to hear the latest from the NFL.

Make sure to also enable The Rookie's Guide to the NFL for scores, schedules, football facts, and more.
comment heading: Best way to get the latest NFL stories
review: Perfect for my morning dose of the NFL. Always gets me caught up on current news and notes that I may have missed throughout the day.

Reiki Music is a skill to give you music for healing, chakra balance, or meditation. Or listen to all for a true healing experience. You can choose one or any combination. These musical selections have been specifically selected to be wonderful for each application.

This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.

Needs LOTS of work... Plus I think she has an infatuation with Denny Hamlin, first person for her to always say anything about...

name: Jammin' Jon's Wrestling News.
description: Need your daily dose of what's going on in the WWE, TNA, ROH, NJPW, and the Indies? Don't want to check the dirtsheets? Leave it up to Jammin' Jon! He will provide you every single day with the latest news in Professional Wrestling. Don't miss out on this! It's better than a bodyslam!
comment heading: Best wrestling news aggregate - Jammin John is the man
review: Incredibly informative and incredibly sincere. Jammin John rattles off every possible piece of news, rumors, injury updates, promotion schedules, the business side of the business...absolutely everything. Instead of spending an hour googling to find all this info scattered about the internet, listen to John - he’s doing it for you. And it’s straight information, too - no injected opinions. The only time subjectivity creeps in is in his sincere well wishes of speedy recovery to injured talent. And I just like the guy. Its obvious he’s a genuine fan and loves and respects the business. Jammin John is the man.

skills-rest: Boston Red Sox Baseball Trivia Unauthorized
name: Boston Red Sox Baseball Trivia Unauthorized
description:
Red Sox baseball trivia was amassed by a long time avid fan. This new skill is fun to play year round.

Red Sox baseball trivia is great for the entire family! Play with or against each other and see who really know their trivia!

New trivia is constantly being added to the skill so keep coming back to play!

This skill is not sponsored by or endorsed by Major League Baseball or the Boston Red Sox. This is a fan created game.

name: NCAA March Madness
description:
NCAA March Madness for Alexa delivers real-time tournament scores, schedules, information about your Bracket Picks, and live radio for each game.

Example Phrases:

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games are on right now?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's scores.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's schedule.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games can I listen to on the radio?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for the score of the North Carolina game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness to play the Duke versus Kentucky game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what time the Kansas game starts.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness how my bracket is doing.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness who I picked to win it all.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness which teams I picked today.”

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.
review: Fantastic!! This is one of the BEST skills, for sure.

name: UC Irvine Athletics
description:
UC Irvine Athletics for Alexa can keep you up to date with the Anteaters. Let Alexa update you with the latest news from the Anteaters, including game results, team news, and schedules.

For more information, visit ucirvinesports.com/alexa or tweet us at @UCIAthletics.
review: I love being able to quickly keep up with my ‘Eaters. A must have for fans of UC Irvine Athletics

name: Gymnastics Facts

name: American Football Odds
description:
American Football Odds gives “Unofficial NFL” odds or game lines based on the spread. American Football Odds gives the lines for up to 10 games currently on the roster for the next 24 hours. American Football Odds are updated hourly for all games, unless they are currently in play, or have been played, then information will not be given. This information is taken from an average of online sports books and is not guaranteed to be accurate. Please check your betting odds or game lines before placing your wagers.
 
This information and skill is sponsored by TheVegasBook.win

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:

Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league.

name: Who's on First?
description:
Who's on first? What's on second? For the first time ever, hear the world famous Abbott & Costello baseball themed comedy routine spoken by a virtual assistant. Play ball!

If you enjoyed this skill, please tell a friend and remember to leave it a 5 star review in your Alexa app. Thanks in advance!!!
review: The script is correct, but it does not sound good in Alexa voice.

name: FootballLive
description:
This skill is used primarily to listen to live scores of football matches from all around the globe. One can listen to the score line of the live matches and recently finished matches. Upcoming matches which are just about to start can also be found. We bring you access to everything from the football action from the popular countries like England, Germany, Spain,Italy etc to your favourite league from your own country supporting about 100 different countries. We will also provide live scores for the upcoming football world cup 2018 ,other international events like confederations cup. This include playoffs, country friendlies, qualifiers etc. Also apart from increasing the number of countries supported we also provide support for alternate football tournaments like FA Cup, championship league, 2nd division football, World Cup U-20. In total you have access to around 100 different countries with total supported number of tournaments/leagues/play offs/friendlies/international etc.. more than 750!!!

To invoke the skill say football live.

After invoking the skill one can get the live score of a match in the league of a country by saying just the country name or saying football country name. By default, this will  search for live scores in the top divsion leagues  and if not found will search in the other leagues. For example if I say England, the skill will check for live matches happening now in the English Premier League and provide me with the live score if any match is going on.
If there is no match currently ongoing in that country, we show a sample list of few countries for which live scores are available now.

Many more new features are planned to also provide other information like league standings, upcoming fixtures, events like Red Cards, Goals Scored by Players etc.
review: Could not get England scores, app kept saying England was invalid

The Rookie's Guide to the NFL is your official way to learn about the National Football League. Become an expert by asking about the rules, penalties, scoring plays, commentator lingo, previous Super Bowls, team formations, and more.

name: Upper Hand Fantasy
description:
The Upper Hand Fantasy skill provides you with instant answers to your start/sit questions in any given week, and even distinguishes between PPR and non-PPR. Once you open the skill by saying "Alexa, open Upper Hand Fantasy," Alexa will ask you to give two names to compare. You can say something like "David Johnson or Jordan Howard" and it will respond with an answer based on our latest rankings. 

Our rankings are updated multiple times a week to reflect on the latest news and updates throughout the NFL landscape. Even if you are not inside the skill, you can ask like so: "Alexa, ask Upper Hand Fantasy who to start between David Johnson and Le'veon Bell." It will give you an instant answer. More features will be coming soon! Check us out at upperhandfantasy,com!

name: Coast Soccer League
description:
Ask Alexa 
 
• When is my next game?
  Recites the next game details like date and time according to the schedule.

• What are our standings? 
  Recites the progress of the selected team.

• What is our coach's phone number?
  Recites the selected teams coach's phone number.

• How many cards does our team have?
  Recites the cards issued to the selected team.

• What was the score of our last game?
  Recitest the score of the last game played by the selected team.
	
• What is the weather report for our next game?
  Recites the weather forecast for the location of next game.

• How long will it take to get to our next game or How many days to our next game? 
  Recites the number of days to next game.

• How many cards does {TEAM NAME} {GENDER} {YEAR} {BRACKET} have?
  Allows the user to specify custom Team , Gender , Year and Bracket to know the cards issued for the team.

• When does {TEAM NAME} {GENDER} {YEAR} [BRACKET} play next?
Allows the user to know next game time with respect to the choosen Team , Gender , Year and Bracket . 

More coming soon!!

This skill requires account linking.

name: Baseball Reference
description:
Welcome to the Baseball Reference Alexa application. This application makes finding out leaders in certain statistics as easy as just asking. As of right now this app can only return top ranking and you cannot make request by specific players or team statistics.

Users are able to request a multitude of different statistics that can be further specified by rank (1-10), top amount (top two, top three, top four, etc.) year (1871 - present), and league (All of Baseball, National League or American League). 

Here are some initial example requests:
-------------------------------------------
Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who is third in the National League in home runs.

Who leads the league in doubles?

Who lead the American League in wins in nineteen eighty six?

Who is the oldest player in the league?

Alexa, ask Baseball Reference, in nineteen ninety nine, who lead the league in home runs?

Who was top three in strikeouts?

Who was tenth in wins in the National League in nineteen seventy two
-------------------------------------------

Another feature available to users is that after a user makes a successful request and are prompted to ask another question, a user can build upon their previous request.


For Example:
-------------------------------------------
User Requests - "Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who was second in the National League in hits in nineteen eighty three"

Alexa Responds - "Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits in 1983."

The user can now request a few things:

- Next -
User Requests - "Who was next?"
Alexa Responds -  "Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits in 1983."

- Previous -
User Requests - "Who was previous?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983 ."

- Rank -
User Requests - "Who was sixth?"
Alexa Responds -  "Dickie Thon was sixth in the National League with 177 Hits In 1983."

- Top -
User Requests - "Who was top three?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983. Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits In 1983. Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits In 1983."

review: Try asking for an ERA instead of an earned run average, and you're up a creek. Try asking for a specific player's stats ("How many hits did Dansby Swanson have?") and Alexa is reduced to an imbecile. I'm glad there is at least a skill--the NFL has nothing at all--but there is so far to go to make this really useful.

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.
comment heading: Alexa wont play games on tv
review: I have an nba app on my tv and Alexa will only open the app. I cant get Alexa to watch a game on tv. It can only play it on Echo dot as a radio game but not on my tv. Please allow Alexa to open and play any games on the NBA LEAGUE PASS using the tv app and not the radio only.

name: Vintage Phillies Games
description: UNOFFICIAL SKILL.  Like baseball? Do you love the Phillies? Miss the old days with Whitey, Harry and the gang? Well, then you're in the right place! Listen to vintage games from 1977 through 1999 (missing games from '84 and '92)!
review: brings back so namy giod memories!

name: Unofficial MLB Game Info
description:
Now you can get MLB game information for your favorite teams right in your Flash Briefing!  This Skill has one feed for every MLB team so be sure to enable the feeds for the teams you are interested in.  Data for all feeds is currently refreshed every few minutes.

This Skill currently tells you the following during your Flash Briefing:
* Result and score for today's game if already played or in progress
* Time for today's game if not yet played (time reported always in US Eastern timezone)
* Result and score for yesterday's game if there was one

Please note, Flash Briefing Skills must have a "Default" feed.  The Tampa Bay Rays feed will be enabled by default (the author's favorite team), so please remember to disable it in your Flash Briefing settings if you do not want Rays information.  Here's how you can enable a different feed:
  1. Open the Alexa App or go to https://alexa.amazon.com
  2. In the Menu, go to Settings
  3. In Settings, go to Flash Briefing under the Accounts section
  4. This will show you all the Flash Briefing "Feeds" you have turned On and Off.  You should see "Tampa Bay Rays Games" listed under the On section, as that is the default (Go Rays!).  Now under the Off section you should see "Unofficial MLB Game Info" with a little down arrow.  Tap that (it may take a few seconds to list them all, this appears to be a bug in Alexa App).
  5. You should now see all the other 29 MLB teams listed.  Find your team and click/tap on it and this will enable the "Feed".
  6. Now that team should show under the On section and you can turn off the Rays Feed (or keep it on and embrace them as your favorite AL team!).

You can contact me directly at josh@userdel.com, or https://github.com/irlrobot/mlb_game_info, for feedback and bug reports.  Enjoy!

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Major League Baseball (MLB) or any of its affiliates.
review:
Every single word is amazing.
Pure. F-ing. Gold. #winning #MLB

name: FantasyMetrix
description:
Alexa will provide past and present, weekly and season-long, statistics along with advanced metrics derived from NFL players using the Yahoo Fantasy Sports API

How To Use For Metrics:
1. Name of a current NFL player who has played in at least one game
2. Valid football metric pertaining to that player's position (See list below)
3. Year of an NFL season ranging from 2001 – Present
4. Week number is merely optional (Week 1 – 17)
5. Target metrics are only available beginning from year 2014 – Present

How To Use For Schedule:
1. Name of an NFL team
2. Year of an NFL season ranging from 2002 – Present
3. Week number ranging from Week 1 – 17

Quick Example Phrases:
Alexa, ask FantasyMetrix Rob Gronkowski, season stats, 2010

name: StatMuse
description:
StatMuse lets you explore sports statistics, schedules and scores in a whole new way, straight from your favorite players and personalities. Say "Alexa, ask StatMuse who has the most career receiving yards?" and hear Jerry Rice tell you about his record. Then try "Who had the most touchdowns last season?" to hear from David Johnson. Ask "When are the Falcons playing next?" to have Devonta Freeman give you his game schedule.



StatMuse provides instant answers to your NBA, NFL, MLB & NHL questions and features the authentic voices of Peyton Manning, Le'Veon Bell, Drew Brees, Terrell Owens, Jerry Rice and other players, plus Scott Van Pelt and Joe Buck. StatMuse is the officially licensed AI of the NFL Players Association.

Start by asking:
"Alexa, open Statmuse…"

“How did the Eagles do?”
"Who had the most passing yards in a season?"
After hearing Drew Brees answer, ask "Where did you go to college?" or "How many touchdowns did you have last season?"

"Who won the World Series in 1945?"
"Which pitcher had the most strikeouts last year?"
After hearing the answer, ask "What is his career ERA?"

"How did Steph Curry do last season?"
“Who do the Rockets play this week?”

“What hockey games are on tonight?”
“Tell me about the Golden Knights.”
StatMuse has comprehensive stats going back to 1947 for the NBA, 1920 for the NFL, 1876 for MLB and 1917 for the NHL.

Here are just a few of the stats now available to you, instantly: https://www.statmuse.com/getting-started/examples
review: Pretty cool stuff here!  Looking forward to seeing what updates are made to this.  Sky is limit on this one.

name: Running Clothes
description:
Wondering what to wear on your next run? 
The Running Clothes Advisor takes the guesswork out of getting dressed for your next outdoor run based on your local weather conditions. This simple guide may prompt you to enable location permissions in your Alexa app. If you do not wish to enable location permissions say, "My Inputs" for your personalized apparel recommendation.

Our exclusive apparel algorithm provides personalized apparel recommendations based on weather conditions and gender. This skill has been optimized with screen support for Echo Show and Echo Spot devices.

After your run, re-open the Running Clothes advisor and select "log my run." You can record your miles ran and how your run went. You can also tell Alexa if her recommendation was too hot or too cold and the algorithm will automatically adjust your recommendations going forward.

If you choose apparel advice based current weather conditions, Alexa will pull temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other weather conditions based on your zip code. Alexa will prompt you for your gender and create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive apparel algorithm. Our exclusive algorithm is based on years of running experience and races including 5K, 10K, 10 Miler, Half Marathon, and Full Marathon distances. Caroline Dunn is a New York City Marathon 2018 Finisher.

If you select running outfit advice based on your inputs, Alexa will ask you for your gender, temperature, weather conditions (sunny, windy, cloudy, or raining), and your run intensity (easy run, or race), to create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive algorithm. Feel free to adjust based on your personal preference. This is only intended to be a guide.

Disclaimer: Please consult a physician before beginning a new workout program.

Created by: Caroline Dunn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinedunn/
https://twitter.com/thecarolinedunn
https://www.instagram.com/thecarolinedunn/
http://carolinedunn.org/
http://alexadevgroup.com/
review: This is a good skill. It asks me a few questions about my run, then it makes a recommendation of what to wear. Just what I was looking for! It saves me having to check my phone to know what to wear for my run. Instead, I just need to know the temperature. Ideally, the next ceraion woulsd know my location and the local weather. excoted to use this!

"Alexa, Start calling the hogs and beat Alabama"
review: PLEASE!

name: Philadelphia Sports Center
description: Philadelphia Sports Center provides news on Philadelphia sports including the Phillies, Eagles, 76ers and Flyers.
review: Horrible. Does not finish thoughts. Unusual subject matter.

name: Baseball Trivia App
description:
Try to answer these multiple choice questions about your favorite game of Baseball. See how many you get right. 

Get started by telling Alexa to 'open baseball trivia app'. From that point the app will guide you.

name: ESPN Flash Briefing
description:
Want to stay up to date on the latest sports news? From Aaron Rodgers to Zlatan Ibrahimović, your ESPN Flash Briefings bring you the hottest stories in sports, updated throughout the day.
 
Add ESPN to your Flash Briefing, then say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" to tune in.
review: A quick and informative way to deliver your news about sports.

name: Sports Illustrated Play
description:
Sports Illustrated Play is a leading sports team and league management system, now providing schedules, communications, and more to busy coaches and youth sports families in an easy-to-use skill. The SI Play skill is free and can be used with any team or club using the SI Play Mobile App!


What Features are integrated with Alexa?

- Ask for upcoming game times & location

- Create games or practices (coach only)

- Get event location info, including weather updates

- Send a team chat and check most recent chat conversations


ABOUT SI PLAY

SI Play is smart sport technology designed to simplify your hectic sports life while also celebrating the stories, moments, and goodness of sport.

Our powerful suite of sports management tools are designed to help youth sports leagues and teams – plus the coaches, parents and fans that support them – operate with peak efficiency throughout their season. 

Online registration and payments, league & team websites, scheduling, communications, digital player passes, live scoring and much more, all fully integrated from desktop to mobile app.

Whether you win, lose, or are just having fun, we believe in the power of PLAY. And as team parents, coaches, tournament directors, and league administrators ourselves, we know what it takes to make it all happen. 

Simplify & Celebrate Your Sports Life!

To find out more about SI Play's league and team management services, visit: www.siplay.com

name: NBA Flash Briefing
description: Follow the latest news and game recaps from around the NBA within Alexa's Flash Briefing. After enabling the skill, say things like "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" Or, "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear your flash briefings. Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find "Flash Briefing" to move NBA Flash Briefing to the top of your news brief.
review: Love the NBA and this flash briefing gives a great recap of yesterday’s action!

name: Seahawks Calendar
description: Calendar for Seahawk games

name: Lebron's Latest Tweet
description:
LEBRON JAMES + LAKERS FANS! Just say Alexa, open Lebron's latest tweet, and she'll read you the latest tweet from @KingJames. 

Help us make this Skill better, give us 5 stars in the Skill Store!

Enjoy!

name: PGA TOUR
description: We can make it: Keep up to date on the latest scores from every PGA TOUR event throughout the season.  Ask Alexa for the latest leaderboard or get the score of your favorite player.  See more information here: https://www.pgatour.com/products/voiceassistant.html
review: Not working for me

name: Test of Death
description:
Warning:
This Test of death is sometimes impossible to win! Do you dare to activate the Test of death?
You will be asked three questions and if you answer correctly you win, answer incorrectly then you will lose. This skill is re-playable and the third question can vary. 

Side note: This is obviously inspired by Monty Python's Holy Grail and i thought it would be cool to adapt this into an Alexa skill.
review:
Doesn’t make any sense to me. Q1.what is your name?  A:Robert Q2. What is your quest?. A:  I don’t know.Q3. What is the first positive number?  A:  I don’t know. Then I die.
What’s the point? STUPID!  I thought it would be a challenging quiz type game. Amazon should check these “skills “ and delete them if they are absolutely worthless.  Not sure if this is a Monty Python thing or not, or if I’m missing something here.

name: Sports Recap
description: Stay on top of your favorite sports and teams with the Sports Recap Skill. Simply ask the Sports Recap Skill for the recap about the team or teams you're interested in. For the Cardinals, Giants, Jets, Kings, Panthers, and Rangers make sure you include the city name as well so Alexa knows which team you're talking about.
review: Detailed recap of games.  An essential for a sports fan.  Now if they can just fix the preview version.

name: Sounders Chants
description: Seattle Sounders match chants and lyrics. Get ready to sing along with Emerald City Supporters.
review: We sit by ECS and listen too before heading down to the match.

name: Cricket Info
description:
You can ask for brief, detailed or quick score updates. You can ask for score or schedule for any team. Examples, 
“Alexa, ask cricket info to get score update” gets brief score update of all on going matches.
“Alexa, ask cricket info to get team India schedule” gets schedule of team India cricket matches.
"Alexa, ask cricket info to get IPL update" gets score updates for ongoing IPL matches. 
“Alexa, ask cricket info to get quick score update” gets score summary for all ongoing matches, you can optionally request quick score for a team.
“Alexa, ask cricket info to get team Australia detailed score” gets detailed score for ongoing match of team Australia.
review: Great app - gives me everything I want with no hassles.

name: My Bridge Radio
description:
My Bridge Radio is a skill to help you play the internet stream of Nebraska's local Christian radio network. 

You can say:

"Alexa, play My Bridge Radio"
"Alexa, open My Bridge Radio"
"Alexa, start My Bridge Radio"
"Alexa, launch My Bridge Radio"

Please send us an email with your suggestions at email@mybridgeradio.net
review: A great radio station to help keep me connected to God and His work in Nebraska! My kids love it too!! Commercial free is the best!

name: Grandstand Podcasts
description: Giving you the Quick Sports Minute Update covering the biggest headlines in sports.
review: Nice quick update from the sports world.

name: Sing Bear Down!
description: As the Chicago Bears are one of the most iconic and popular teams in NFL history, it only made sense to teach Alexa how to pay homage to the great Chicago Bears. If you prompt her "Alexa, Bear Down" she will continue to sing the fight song through to the end. Join in with her or let her sing solo.

name: Timbers Army
description: Displays a few facts about the Timbers Army
review:
Hi root for the Timbers

👏👏👏

 👏👏

name: CBS Sports Minute
description: Boomer Esiason, John Feinstein, Doug Gottlieb and Jim Rome provide unique commentaries in the world of Sports news
review: The Red Sox win the World Series and there is no mention at all. Combine that with stupid commercials and this Skill is Worthless!  Pathetic CBS, Pathetic.

name: Baseball BASIQs
description:
Baseball BASIQs helps develop your players' baseball IQ. 

Ask Alexa for a "situation" for any position and she will give you a setup (runners on base, # of outs) and tell you where and how the ball is hit.  She then takes a brief pause before explaining what should be done in the given situation.

An example would be:
 - "You are playing shortstop"
 - "There are runners on First and Third"
 - "There is one out"
 - "There is a hard-ground ball to Second Baseman"
 - "What is your play?"
 - "Your play is to hustle to Second Base to take the toss from Second Baseman for one out and then make quick throw to First Base to complete the double play!"

Baseball BASIQs contains over 7,000 situations to learn from! Give us a try today! 

Check us out at www.BASIQs.com
review: What a great way to work on the mental side of the game.

name: World Cup Soccer Trivia
description:
If you are a soccer fan and you like keeping up to date with world cup tournaments and players, this is the quiz to put your knowledge to the test. 

If you don't know that much, this quiz will help you to learn more about the world of soccer. In every quiz, you will get 5 questions to answer, testing your knowledge. 

Keep coming back for more, because each set of 5 questions are randomly selected from a large pool of questions!

You can answer the questions with phrases like:
"The answer is <one>"
"My answer is <two>"
"Is it <three>"
"<four> is my answer"

name: Fantasy Camp
description: Bleacher Report Lead Fantasy Football Analyst and Sirius/XM Fantasy Sports Radio Host Matt Camp keeps you ahead of the game on the best waiver wire moves, separates the one-week wonders from the long-term stars, and breaks down the best and worst matchups to help you construct the best possible lineups each week. Catch episodes every Tuesday and Thursday.
review: The intro to this is so long and useless and it’s the same thing explaining no questions on players before Thursday. Just get to the show and start talking. Most don’t have time to wait 10 min for you to get into it.

name: College Football Roster Info
description:
The College Football Roster Info skill lets you get information about any player on any team in the FBS by name or number. Simply ask Alexa about players by using their full name, last name, or number and their team and she will tell you key information about them like their height, weight, class and hometown. 
Note: information is current as of the start of the season, if you find numbers have changed let me know as the teams sometimes shuffle those in the first week or so.
comment heading: Use short names for it to work
review: The app does what it should if you give the short name for the school, like Wisconsin, Akron, Miami, Ohio State, and Kent State.

name: Team Time
description: Enable this free skill, and speak to your teamSNAP account from any Amazon Alexa device.  Now everyone in your family can ask about the next game or practice.  This is a life saver for parents that have kids in organized sports.  Find out practice times, game locations, and jersey color for any scheduled event for your team.
review: Needs work.  The male voice is much lower in volume than Alexa.  Also, when I ask when my next game is, Alexa tells me some random NHL hockey game and not my son’s little league game.  It would be better if you didn’t have to mention Team Time at all.  Just have Alexa access the Team Snap calendar in her voice.  Also the ending with reminding me to be a good sport is corny.  It’s not just the player accessing the info.  Needs work.  Seems like a beta.

name: One Minute Workout Sensei
description:
UPDATE: Michael just added another workout because he wants you to get RIPPED fast! (workouts will play randomly so you never know what you're going to get)

Join Michael, your One Minute Workout Sensei, as he helps you gain muscle and lose weight--right from your very own kitchen! It only takes one minute per day for noticeable results. 

ABOUT YOUR SENSEI: Michael is a high-energy, over-the-top, passionate Navy SEAL-style instructor, who exercises 24/7. He wants to take YOU to the next level--and he'll make DARN SURE you get there. 

You can say:

"Alexa, start one minute workout"
"Alexa, open one minute workout"
"Alexa, play one minute workout"

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill and Michael will add more FREE workouts! Send us an email with your suggestions at k@app316.com.

*The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

name: Maryland Fishing Report
description: Listen to the Maryland Fishing Report from the Maryland Department of Natural Resources for the latest hotspots, catch of the week, fishing conditions and more. You can request specific information for the upper, middle or lower Chesapeake Bay, freshwater fishing or Atlantic Ocean and coastal bays. Simply say ‘Alexa, open Maryland Fishing Report.’ Be in the know before you go!
review: she basically just reads the dnr report for you.  Just don't ask her to spot burn!

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.
review: Cannot link my leaguepass to the alexa app, whats the use??

name: SunUps
description:
SunUps is a 12 step mind and body exercise routine based on the ancient yogic practice of Surya Namaskar. The skill allows you to do the following:

BROWSE
Say Alexa, Ask Sunups to begin browse mode.
In this mode, you can browse through the steps by saying NEXT, REPEAT or START OVER. Listen to detailed instructions for each step and practice replicating each pose.

TRAIN
Say Alexa, Ask Sunups to begin training mode.
The skill provides a training module for those who are unaware of the steps involved in Surya Namaskar. Follow along with Alexa till you are comfortable doing SunUps on your own. Listen to detailed instructions to replicate each pose. Alexa will keep track of the number of sets you do.

TIP OF THE DAY!
Alexa, ask Sunups to tell me a tip/fact OR tip of the day.
The app provides detailed information about the various benefits of making SunUps a daily practice and the various ways to deepen your practice. 

DO
Alexa, ask Sunups to start expert mode.
Once you have learned how to do SunUps or are already familiar with them, you are ready to start doing them and let Alexa track your progress for you! Try to complete all levels to become a Sunups ninja! This mode provides Sun chants and Flute music accompaniment to elevate your experience.


SCORE
Alexa, ask Sunups for my score.
Alexa, ask Sunups to reset my score.

Alexa will tell you what level you are on and how many Sunups you will need to go to the next one! 

ALTERNATE NOSTRIL BREATHING/ BELLY BREATHING
Alexa, Ask Sunups to Begin breathing exercise.

Use calming flute music as an accompaniment for your daily 10-minute pranayama or breathing exercises. View the card for instructions.

MEDITATE

Alexa, ask Sunups to start guided relaxation.
Relax your body and mind with awareness using the 9-minute guided relaxation track provided. You may use the guided relaxation track to relax whenever you feel stressed or anxious.

Alexa, ask Sunups to start sun chants
You can use the 4-minute sun chants track for an energizing meditation experience.

*DISCLAIMER: Please seek your doctor's advice before you start these exercises. The information provided are tips and should be not considered as medical advice. *
review: Have not been able to begin sunups. Everyday Alexa says she is unable to access sunups skill right now.

name: Let's Talk Soccer
description: Football. Soccer. Futbol.  Wherever you're from and whatever you call it, you love The Beautiful Game.  So do we. We're a father and son team that lives the sport. Our daily briefings will focus primarily on the Premier League and Fantasy Premier League.  On the Fantasy side, we offer information and tips - everything you'll need to put manage your best FPL team.  But, we go further and deeper with the content to include major news events, such as player transfer, as well as big stories from other domestic leagues, the big tournaments (think: Champions League), and all the notable and newsworthy players.  We provide insights and perspectives that you won't find anywhere else.  We know our stuff and deliver it in a passionate and fun way. Also, check us out on Instagram - @ LetsTalkSoccer - where you'll find even more information and entertainment related to the game.  We hope you enjoy!
review: Lots of great coverage of football happenings and FPL tips and insights.

skills-rest: Real Runs - Running Tips for Runners
name: Real Runs - Running Tips for Runners
description: Discover how to be like the fittest and healthiest runners in the world with only small changes. We give you scientifically-tested running tips from famous running coaches like Bill Bowerman, Terrence Mahon, Jack Daniels, Joan Benoit, Clyde Hart, and others.  This briefing will help you naturally improve your runs, from beginners to more advanced runners. We will guide you to get more energy for runs and show you the secrets that top runners share with each other, including Olympic athletes.  Our daily dose will make you a better runner and help you optimize your runs.  Caution: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.  Please consult a doctor before starting a running workout.
review: Have incorporated a few of these tips when I go for a run and it's paying off!

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

name: FantasyMetrix
description:
Alexa will provide past and present, weekly and season-long, statistics along with advanced metrics derived from NFL players using the Yahoo Fantasy Sports API

How To Use For Metrics:
1. Name of a current NFL player who has played in at least one game
2. Valid football metric pertaining to that player's position (See list below)
3. Year of an NFL season ranging from 2001 – Present
4. Week number is merely optional (Week 1 – 17)
5. Target metrics are only available beginning from year 2014 – Present

How To Use For Schedule:
1. Name of an NFL team
2. Year of an NFL season ranging from 2002 – Present
3. Week number ranging from Week 1 – 17

Quick Example Phrases:
Alexa, ask FantasyMetrix Rob Gronkowski, season stats, 2010
Alexa, ask FantasyMetrix Julio Jones, yards per reception, 2011
Alexa, ask FantasyMetrix Marshawn Lynch, rushing yards, 2012

name: Teams Quiz
description:
Teams Quiz is an interactive game that challenges your knowledge of sports teams and the cities that they belong to. You have choices from a  variety of sports including hockey, baseball, basketball and football. 

The game offers clues through answer choices to help you guess the names of the cities or teams. If you are newbie to sports teams, do not despair - there is plenty of assistance built in.

To start the game simply say "Alexa, launch teams quiz". The game then will ask you to pick a sport of your choice - hockey, baseball, basketball or football. Once you make your choice, it then dives into the teams for that sport. You can ask for help, switch to a different sport or stop the game at any time.

Have fun learning your teams and their cities!

name: Baseball Live
description:
Find more information than the built-in MLB functions.

-See who is pitching or batting for your team
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live who is pitching for The Phillies"
-See what is currently happening in your team's game
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what's the score of The Phillies game"
-See what play just happened in your team's game
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what's happening in The Phillies game"
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what just happened in The Phillies game"
-Check the standings
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live how many games back are The Mets"
-See the lines score
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live for the line score of The Phillies game"

Pro Version
-Get a team briefing including the score of the game, the standings in the division/wild card, and updates on the teams relevant in the standings

The negative reviews about this skill not including women’s tennis news are in-warranted. The ATP is the name of the men’s pro tennis tour, the women’s pro tennis tour is the WTA.

Giving this skill negative reviews for not having women’s tennis news is the equivalent of given a WNBA skill negative reviews for not including NBA news.

description: The E.P.L Match Day skill will keep you up to date on scheduled fixtures, results for matches for the current day which have concluded and live scores if the match is currently in progress.

name: Continuous Cycling
description: Looking for a reliable provider and source of cycling news? Continuous Cycling has you covered! This Skill will allow your Alexa to keep you updated on the latest cycling headlines around the world!

name: Coach Harbaugh
description:
Need to get fired up? Of course you don't - you are already attacking today with an enthusiasm unknown to mankind. But how about having your own personal Jim Harbaugh to entertain you on game day? Or on Mondays. Or every single morning while you wash down your steak breakfast with whole milk. 

You can say:
1. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh for a quote
2. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh to play "The Victors"
3. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh WHO'S GOT IT BETTER THAN US!?

Please note that this skill is not affiliated with the University of Michigan in any way. I'm just a fan with the constitutional right to share Jim Harbaugh's wisdom with you.

Special thanks to Sibish Basheer for making this possible.
review: Doesn't  get  any  better  than  this. Wake  up  every  morning  or pick  yourself  up during  a down day with the man  that  can  motivate  anyone . Go Blue!

review: Why are all of the golf-related flash briefing choices like this. I’ve tried 3 and all of them report 48 hour old results! If you’re interested enough in golf to bother setting up an update in your daily flash briefing then two-day old updates are of little-to-no value!

name: Euro Matchday
description: This Skill will tell you the results of the current Match Day of UEFA Euro 2016, The second biggest soccer tournament in the world which is currently in progress. If a match has yet to be played, it will inform the user of the kick off time in UTC. If the match has concluded, it will read out the final scores. If the match is in progress, it will report the live score.
review: Great updates on euro

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:

Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to get: 
– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– your team’s injury/bye status. 
– player scores and injury updates.
All without ever putting your hands on the ball.

——

NOTE: This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em.

name: Soccer Drills
description:
**Version 2.0 Update**
If you are interested in improving your soccer skills, this is the Skill for you! Soccer Drills is a skill that was designed to improve soccer skills using several common drills, in a fun manner. Drills include tick tocks, toe touches, juggling, and more. 

To get started, say "Alexa, Start Soccer Drills", and you will be prompted to select a drill, and can immediately start to improve your soccer game.

Please share any feedback, as we are anxious to make this a great aid to your soccer game!

name: Unofficial MLB Game Info
description:
Now you can get MLB game information for your favorite teams right in your Flash Briefing!  This Skill has one feed for every MLB team so be sure to enable the feeds for the teams you are interested in.  Data for all feeds is currently refreshed every few minutes.

This Skill currently tells you the following during your Flash Briefing:
* Result and score for today's game if already played or in progress
* Time for today's game if not yet played (time reported always in US Eastern timezone)
* Result and score for yesterday's game if there was one

Please note, Flash Briefing Skills must have a "Default" feed.  The Tampa Bay Rays feed will be enabled by default (the author's favorite team), so please remember to disable it in your Flash Briefing settings if you do not want Rays information.  Here's how you can enable a different feed:
  1. Open the Alexa App or go to https://alexa.amazon.com
  2. In the Menu, go to Settings
  3. In Settings, go to Flash Briefing under the Accounts section
  4. This will show you all the Flash Briefing "Feeds" you have turned On and Off.  You should see "Tampa Bay Rays Games" listed under the On section, as that is the default (Go Rays!).  Now under the Off section you should see "Unofficial MLB Game Info" with a little down arrow.  Tap that (it may take a few seconds to list them all, this appears to be a bug in Alexa App).
  5. You should now see all the other 29 MLB teams listed.  Find your team and click/tap on it and this will enable the "Feed".
  6. Now that team should show under the On section and you can turn off the Rays Feed (or keep it on and embrace them as your favorite AL team!).

You can contact me directly at josh@userdel.com, or https://github.com/irlrobot/mlb_game_info, for feedback and bug reports.  Enjoy!

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Major League Baseball (MLB) or any of its affiliates.
review: This is an awesome skill. Easy to setup and use. Lets play ball!

review: A bit long and rambling.

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.

name: Daily Alphabet Affirmation

Alphabet Affirmation is a skill to help you upgrade how you feel instantly. Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at (feedback@aialchemy.com). Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, thanks!
