*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.
review: Awesome for my husband who is blind. Now he can follow what's going on.  Good job, Alexa !

name: Reiki Music
description:
Reiki Music is a skill to give you music for healing, chakra balance, or meditation. Or listen to all for a true healing experience. You can choose one or any combination. These musical selections have been specifically selected to be wonderful for each application. 

Included:
Zen Garden by Sound Healing Center
Ananda by Anne Brunson
Chakra Healing Tones for each chakra by Kaleah
Weightless by Marconi Union


You can say:

"Alexa, open Reiki Music"
"Alexa, start Reiki Music"
"Alexa, launch Reiki Music"

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at ReikiAwakening.com. Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, thanks!
comment heading: Doesn't Open or Selects Reggae Music
review: Beautiful sounds but extremely frustrating to open, which defeats the purpose.

name: Philadelphia 76ers
description: The official Philadelphia 76ers skill is your guide to every NBA season. Whether you’re looking for a recap of last night’s action, or looking for the Sixers' next game and how to watch it, this skill has you covered. You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Sixers' current conference standing!
review: this skill is great needs a little more polishing but I'm glad I can enable it because even when the Philadelphia 76ers aren't number one they are number one

name: Bleed Purple
description:
"Alexa, bleed purple"

Grilled Cheese Thursday.  The Quad.  21-16   The smell of dog food when it rains.  Gingerbread House.  D-Hall.  The Breeze. JMaddy.  You bleed purple and gold.

name: WV MetroNews Sports Briefing
description: West Virginia's top sports stories updated throughout the day.
review: 5 stars because it covers what's important and doesn't waste time talking about small schools like Marshall.

name: Broncos Fan
description:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Broncos by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Broncos.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Broncos Fan how are the Broncos doing? 

Alexa, ask Broncos Fan who do the Broncos play next?

Alexa, ask Broncos Fan Von Miller (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Broncos:


Alexa, ask Broncos Fan to tell me some trivia about the Broncos. 

Alexa, ask Broncos Fan how many Super Bowls have the Broncos won?
review:
I installed this skill and activated it. I then asked Alexa to open the skill and the Echo would blink twice and do nothing else. I then tried to ask Alexa questions about the Broncos and she would responded that she didn't know. I removed the skill and reinstalled the skill and got the same result.

I emailed support about the issue and they tolde me to remove the skill and install the skill again. I did. And no difference. Support gave me a number to call and I was told the same thing as the first support said to do. So this skill didn't work for me.

name: San Antonio Spurs
description: The official San Antonio Spurs skill is your guide to every NBA season. Whether you’re looking for a recap of last night’s action, or looking for the Spurs' next game and how to watch it, this skill has you covered. You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Spurs' current conference standing!
review: Great app to check the Schedule of the greatest franchise in the NBA.

name: OH - IO
description:
Show off your Buckeye pride! 
When you say "OH" Alexa says "IO"!
review: Love it. Great job Nicholas.

name: NCAA March Madness
description:
NCAA March Madness for Alexa delivers real-time tournament scores, schedules, information about your Bracket Picks, and live radio for each game.

Example Phrases:

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games are on right now?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's scores.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's schedule.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games can I listen to on the radio?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for the score of the North Carolina game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness to play the Duke versus Kentucky game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what time the Kansas game starts.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness how my bracket is doing.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness who I picked to win it all.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness which teams I picked today.”

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.
review: This skill is terrible. It barely works. If you can get it to give you any information it will be incomplete and then won’t let you access the games it just told you were available. Terrible rotten no good very bad app. Seriously? The NCAA can’t afford to create a functioning means of being involved in the games? Poor NCAA must be really short on funds. Umm yeah sure.

name: Arizona Golf
description: Arizona Golf is the first golf skill that provides the latest news on golf events, golf news, and important golf enthusiast information.    Arizona Golf covers the entire state of Arizona's golf events.
comment heading: Finally found a voice skill and Arizona about golf
review: Great information about Arizona golf events golf tee times golf specials

name: 106.7 The Fan Sports Flash
description: Your latest DC sports news and info from 106.7 The Fan
review: At the end of each broadcast, announcer shouts for Alexa to open "The Fan." Results: every device within earshot in my home opens the fan. Radio broadcasts take over meaningful device use to fill the air with incomprehensible blab. It is unpleasant to hear and it disrupts my work day, as I must reset several devices before returning to work. 106.7 radio, you just lost a fan.

name: Vikings Flash Briefing
description:
With Vikings Flash Briefing, you’ll get weekly updates from the Vikings team reporters. We’ll deliver
updates on the latest news, transactions, injury reports, scores and team events. It’s everything about the Vikings
that you need to know.
review: This flash briefing is never updated.

name: Surf Checker
description:
THE ROCK WAS ADDED AND MOST CALIFORNIA AND HAWAII SURF SPOTS ARE AVAILABLE!

Let Alexa give you the surf report for most California and Hawaii surf spots.  Also for each surf spot, let Alexa also give you the tide report, the water temperature and let you know when is the best day to surf for the upcoming week.

Using the streamlined commands structure, getting the surf report information for several spots is simple and easy.  

Here are examples to try: 
 
"Alexa, Ask Surf Checker for Salt Creek on Tuesday"
"When is the best day to surf Lowers"
"What is the tide report for San Clemente State Beach on Wednesday"
"What is the water temperature at Lihaina Harbor"
"When is the best day to surf Pipeline"

For surf reports, just say the surf spot name for quick results:
For example, just say "Sunset Beach" for the Sunset Beach surf report. Or say, "Sunset Beach on Thursday" to get the report for the upcoming Thursday.        

Alexa also remembers the last surf report you requested so that additional reports do not have to include the spot name.   For example once you ask for a report like:
"What is the surf report for Pismo Beach Pier"

You can get the tide, water temperature, and best day to surf at Pismo Beach Pier by saying:
"What is the tide report" or just "tide report?"
"When is the best day to surf"
"What is the water temperature" or just "water temperature"

If you want to find the tide activity later in the week for Pismo Beach just say:
"Tide report for tomorrow" or "Tide report on Friday"

Listed below are JUST SOME of the surf spots available.  There were too many to list here.  The complete list is at www.surfncircuits.com.  New locations soon!!   If you want your surf spot added please mention it in comment below or at www.surfncircuits.com

Created by Monumental Sports & Entertainment

skills-rest: Who Dat Dish Daily - for New Orleans football fans
name: Who Dat Dish Daily - for New Orleans football fans
description:
Are you a huge New Orleans Saints fan? Then you need the Who Dat Dish Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on the Saints. 

Who Dat Dish is a news and opinions site for fans of the New Orleans Saints brought to you by the FanSided Network. Who Dat Dish is dedicated to providing top-notch Saints news, views, and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.

name: Sports Illustrated Play
description:
Sports Illustrated Play is a leading sports team and league management system, now providing schedules, communications, and more to busy coaches and youth sports families in an easy-to-use skill. The SI Play skill is free and can be used with any team or club using the SI Play Mobile App!


What Features are integrated with Alexa?

- Ask for upcoming game times & location

- Create games or practices (coach only)

- Get event location info, including weather updates

- Send a team chat and check most recent chat conversations


ABOUT SI PLAY

SI Play is smart sport technology designed to simplify your hectic sports life while also celebrating the stories, moments, and goodness of sport.

Our powerful suite of sports management tools are designed to help youth sports leagues and teams – plus the coaches, parents and fans that support them – operate with peak efficiency throughout their season. 

Online registration and payments, league & team websites, scheduling, communications, digital player passes, live scoring and much more, all fully integrated from desktop to mobile app.

Whether you win, lose, or are just having fun, we believe in the power of PLAY. And as team parents, coaches, tournament directors, and league administrators ourselves, we know what it takes to make it all happen. 

Simplify & Celebrate Your Sports Life!

To find out more about SI Play's league and team management services, visit: www.siplay.com
comment heading: Fantastic skill for anyone with kids in sports
review: If your kid as in a league managed in Sports Illustrated Play this skill does a trick to n to make their schedule and team super visible.

name: Tomahawk Take
description:
Are you a huge Atlanta Braves fan? Then you need the Tomahawk Take Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on your Braves. 

Tomahawk Take is the Atlanta Braves news and opinions site brought to you by the FanSided Network. Tomahawk Take is dedicated to providing top-notch Braves news, views, and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.

name: Utah Fishing
description:
Are you headed out the door to your favorite Utah fishing spot and need to know what the fishing is like? Utah Fishing gives you the most up-to-date fishing report including: status, species, and full report!
Open the skill by saying, “Alexa, open Utah Fishing.” Next, simply ask for the specific fishing spot. You can say, “Alexa, what’s the fishing report for Strawberry Reservoir?” Or, without opening the skill, simply ask Alexa for the report all in one command. You can say, “Alexa, ask Utah Fishing for the fishing report at Lake Powell.”
If at any point you need help simply ask Alexa for possible commands by saying, “Alexa help.”
For an interactive fishing reports map visit: https://wildlife.utah.gov/hotspots/

name: GTWBB
description: Georgia Tech women's basketball flash briefing.

name: IPL Master
description: The Indian Premier League (IPL) is a professional Twenty20 cricket league in India contested during April and May of every year by franchise teams representing Indian cities. This skill will tell you unknown facts about players and teams of IPL 2017.
review: Liked the facts. Nice app

name: Bike Stats
description:
A skill to access your Strava cycling achievements and statistics.

At this time only cycling Strava activities are reported.

Virtual rides i.e. zwift/trainers are now included in the reported statistics.

You must link your Strava account to the skill using the Alexa app/webpage.

Supported commands:

Alexa, Ask Bike Stats .....

• about my last ride
Detailed information about your last ride

• about my weekly stats
The number of times and distance you've ridden in the last week

• about my summary
Monthly and annual statistics

• to get my achievements
Lists any KOM/QOM records you may hold

• to get my details
Your name/location and other basic Strava information

• to setup units
Sets your unit preferences for distance covered and height climbed


This skill is Powered by Strava but is an independent creation.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact alexa@knownentity.com
review: Nothing happened. However, my last ride was on Zwift. In any case, I would expect at least a message saying there is no ride... if Zwift doesn’t count.

name: Houston Texans Flash Briefing
description: With the Houston Texans Flash Briefing, you’ll get weekly updates on the latest news for the Texans!
review: Love getting updates through Amazon on the Houston Texans! Its updated once a week with a game recap.  Great if you live out of town and aren't able to watch the game like me!

name: RollTide
description: Say Roll Tide to Alexa and she will respond like a proper Alabam fan.

name: Josh Allen Facts

name: NASCAR

While using NASCAR, you can ask Alexa to play the Podcast, ask about the next race, who is winning the current race, and who won the previous race.
comment heading: All she knows is some advertisers name for a race
review: All I asked her was "where" the next race was.  She knew it was some advertisers name, but NOT the track or location.  This app needs some work.  Potential is there, the data isn't.  This could be a good app if it answered the ques

name: Running Clothes
description:
Wondering what to wear on your next run? 
The Running Clothes Advisor takes the guesswork out of getting dressed for your next outdoor run based on your local weather conditions. This simple guide may prompt you to enable location permissions in your Alexa app. If you do not wish to enable location permissions say, "My Inputs" for your personalized apparel recommendation.

Our exclusive apparel algorithm provides personalized apparel recommendations based on weather conditions and gender. This skill has been optimized with screen support for Echo Show and Echo Spot devices.

After your run, re-open the Running Clothes advisor and select "log my run." You can record your miles ran and how your run went. You can also tell Alexa if her recommendation was too hot or too cold and the algorithm will automatically adjust your recommendations going forward.

If you choose apparel advice based current weather conditions, Alexa will pull temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other weather conditions based on your zip code. Alexa will prompt you for your gender and create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive apparel algorithm. Our exclusive algorithm is based on years of running experience and races including 5K, 10K, 10 Miler, Half Marathon, and Full Marathon distances. Caroline Dunn is a New York City Marathon 2018 Finisher.

If you select running outfit advice based on your inputs, Alexa will ask you for your gender, temperature, weather conditions (sunny, windy, cloudy, or raining), and your run intensity (easy run, or race), to create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive algorithm. Feel free to adjust based on your personal preference. This is only intended to be a guide.

Disclaimer: Please consult a physician before beginning a new workout program.

Created by: Caroline Dunn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinedunn/
https://twitter.com/thecarolinedunn
https://www.instagram.com/thecarolinedunn/
http://carolinedunn.org/
http://alexadevgroup.com/
review: This skill removes one of the last excuses keeping you from your run - “I dont know what to wear” doesn’t stand a chance.

With the Let's Talk Fantasy Football News Alexa Skill and all of our other fantasy football alexa skills, you can always talk fantasy football.

description:

Ask for today's games, yesterday's results or tomorrow's games. Also, ask for the record of your favorite team to get overall match wins and losses for the season. Also included are a few more Overwatch "Hello" emotes when launching the skill.

With the Overwatch League skill you can keep track of when your favorite teams are playing and always know the current league standings. review: Alexa makes me like her more and more. Considering now she can tell me the score instead of me searching for it online, that's pretty awesome.

name: Boxing Legends
description:
Boxing Legends puts you in the shoes of a boxing hopeful, as you rise up the ranks from beginner (then amateur, pro, contender) to the heavyweight champion of the world. 

Boxing Legends is great fun for the whole family as you block and move, duck and weave, would-be knock out punches and then counter-attack with jabs, hooks, crosses and uppercuts. 

Not only is it fun and easy to play, it is a great way to keep your mind sharp as it's a memory game for brain, memory and cognitive training. 

Commands include:
  - BLOCK: say, "block left or right" to defend a punch
   (e.g. to defend 'left jab, right cross', say, "block left, block right")
  - ATTACK: say, "left or right, then jab, hook, cross or uppercut" 
     (e.g. say, "left jab, right cross, left uppercut") 

Note: (1) it's important to say block or move first and then left or right, this makes Alexa pick up your commands better when defending.
(2) A shortcut to blocking is saying 'block left,right,left' etc. 

Other commands include:
- During the attack, you can say, "repeat" 
- To get your win/loss record, say, "my stats"
- At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"    

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Boxing Legends" or "Alexa, open Boxing Legends" .

To help others find Boxing Legends, please leave a review.  We appreciate positive feedback to help improve our skills for the Alexa community.  Check out our skills at www.prosocialvoice.com/alexa-skills.
comment heading: Learn the basics of boxing, punches and defenses
review: This skill walks you through a boxing match and is entertaining!  Nice job.

“Alexa, ask March Madness how my bracket is doing.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness who I picked to win it all.”

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.

name: Robot Roxie
description:
Trying to keep score when you're playing baseball can be difficult, so why not use your Alexa and have it keep score for you?  

Roxie is a skill that tracks all of the basic information around a one-on-one pickup game.  Here are different features.

To begin, say "Start Game" and a new game will be initialized.  By default, the games are three innings long, and each player gets ten swings.

You can customize the player names by saying "Change Player One/Two name to <name>".

Say pitch ball and Roxie will track that a pitch was thrown.  Let Roxie know what happened next - either say "Strike, Ball, or Base Hit" and it will track the score.

name: Buccaneers Fan
description:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Buccaneers by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Buccaneers.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan how are the Buccaneers doing? 

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan who do the Buccaneers play next?

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan Jameis Winston (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Buccaneers:


Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan to tell me some trivia about the Buccaneers. 

Alexa, ask Buccaneers Fan how many Super Bowls have the Buccaneers won?

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to get: 
– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– your team’s injury/bye status. 
– player scores and injury updates.
All without ever putting your hands on the ball.

——

NOTE: This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em.
review: I enable the skill and login successfully, but I can't get the skill to work through Alexa. She keeps saying I need to enable the skill and pushes a card to enable except I've already enabled... Round and round we go.

name: Upper Hand Fantasy
description:
The Upper Hand Fantasy skill provides you with instant answers to your start/sit questions in any given week, and even distinguishes between PPR and non-PPR. Once you open the skill by saying "Alexa, open Upper Hand Fantasy," Alexa will ask you to give two names to compare. You can say something like "David Johnson or Jordan Howard" and it will respond with an answer based on our latest rankings. 

Our rankings are updated multiple times a week to reflect on the latest news and updates throughout the NFL landscape. Even if you are not inside the skill, you can ask like so: "Alexa, ask Upper Hand Fantasy who to start between David Johnson and Le'veon Bell." It will give you an instant answer. More features will be coming soon! Check us out at upperhandfantasy,com!
review: never recognizes any names no matter what players i try

name: Beat Navy
description: Do you miss asking plebes how many and a butt days until we Beat Navy? Alexa knows you do.

Press Conference Questions

how was that defense?
how was the game?
what are you going to do after the game?
how are you feeling?
what's next for you?

You can also ask for facts about Marshawn:

name: NCAA March Madness
description:
NCAA March Madness for Alexa delivers real-time tournament scores, schedules, information about your Bracket Picks, and live radio for each game.

Example Phrases:

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games are on right now?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's scores.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for today's schedule.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what games can I listen to on the radio?”

“Alexa, ask March Madness for the score of the North Carolina game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness to play the Duke versus Kentucky game.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness what time the Kansas game starts.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness how my bracket is doing.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness who I picked to win it all.”

“Alexa, ask March Madness which teams I picked today.”

To ask for help or give feedback on this skill please contact mmlivehelp@turner.com

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.

name: Boxing Legends
description:
Boxing Legends puts you in the shoes of a boxing hopeful, as you rise up the ranks from beginner (then amateur, pro, contender) to the heavyweight champion of the world. 

Boxing Legends is great fun for the whole family as you block and move, duck and weave, would-be knock out punches and then counter-attack with jabs, hooks, crosses and uppercuts. 

Not only is it fun and easy to play, it is a great way to keep your mind sharp as it's a memory game for brain, memory and cognitive training. 

Commands include:
  - BLOCK: say, "block left or right" to defend a punch
   (e.g. to defend 'left jab, right cross', say, "block left, block right")
  - ATTACK: say, "left or right, then jab, hook, cross or uppercut" 
     (e.g. say, "left jab, right cross, left uppercut") 

Note: (1) it's important to say block or move first and then left or right, this makes Alexa pick up your commands better when defending.
(2) A shortcut to blocking is saying 'block left,right,left' etc. 

Other commands include:
- During the attack, you can say, "repeat" 
- To get your win/loss record, say, "my stats"
- At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"    

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Boxing Legends" or "Alexa, open Boxing Legends" .

To help others find Boxing Legends, please leave a review.  We appreciate positive feedback to help improve our skills for the Alexa community.  Check out our skills at www.prosocialvoice.com/alexa-skills.

name: Baseball Scores in 30 seconds

name: Baseball Live
description:
Find more information than the built-in MLB functions.

-See who is pitching or batting for your team
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live who is pitching for The Phillies"
-See what is currently happening in your team's game
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what's the score of The Phillies game"
-See what play just happened in your team's game
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what's happening in The Phillies game"
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live what just happened in The Phillies game"
-Check the standings
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live how many games back are The Mets"
-See the lines score
    - Ex: "Ask Baseball Live for the line score of The Phillies game"

Pro Version
-Get a team briefing including the score of the game, the standings in the division/wild card, and updates on the teams relevant in the standings
review: Awesome. Tells you everything you need to know for baseball.

name: ESPN Radio (via TuneIn)
description: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest sports news from the ESPN Radio SportsCenter.
review: I cannot hear it anymore even on volume 10

name: ESPN Flash Briefing
description:
Want to stay up to date on the latest sports news? From Aaron Rodgers to Zlatan Ibrahimović, your ESPN Flash Briefings bring you the hottest stories in sports, updated throughout the day.
 
Add ESPN to your Flash Briefing, then say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" to tune in.
comment heading: Probably best overall sports Flash Briefing
review:
Plays the short ESPN intro, then gets straight into the hourly news. Just the news--very little, if any, opinions...which is awesome. Covers popular sports first, of course. Don't expect in-depth stuff here.

I find the ESPN and CBS Sports briefings complement each other well, because CBS has one major story for the day. CBS is currently not as solid as ESPN, in my opinion, though.

I do wish there was an optional Briefing that had daily summaries in addition to this hourly summary.

*Note: The live radio feature is currently not supported on Fire TV.

*Note: Must sign-in with a valid Capital One NCAA March Madness Bracket Challenge account in order to get information about your bracket picks.
review: Alexa always says it is not available and to ask later, but still doesn't work. Not good at all.

name: FanDuel: Pick 6
description:
Strap on your helmet and get ready for FanDuel: Pick 6! During the regular season, make six predictions about what you think will happen during the Sunday Night and Monday Night football games. Watch the game, all from the comfort of your couch, check in for updates, and see how many picks you can get right each time you play!

Simply say “Alexa, Open FanDuel” and get started today.
comment heading: Whomever created this is a genius.
review: I laughed my buttocks off at some of the stuff that Coach said and I liked the interplay of using Alexa as the comedic foil. Well-done and all apps should be this thorough and well-written.

name: charter bus fantasy
description:
A charter bus fantasy football league alexa skill.

"Alexa, ask charter bus a random fact?"
"Alexa, ask charter bus what was ben's best finish?"
"Alexa, ask charter bus who is the current champion?"

DISCLAIMER: This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Premier League or any official league. It is an unofficial fantasy football league.

name: Stadium Sounds
description: Get big game ready with the latest skill from ButtonPushApps.  This Alexa skill is used to celebrate TOUCHDOWNS and other big plays during American football games.  We  named this skill StadiumSounds.  This fun skill contains a sound file of a roaring tiger.  Invoke the skill each time your Tiger named sports team scores -  as a way to celebrate - just like you would hear if you were at the game live and in person!!  .
review:
Ok so i try it an i get tigers score , roar, go tigers each time I tried ....
only 1 sound so far??? Maybe we will keep a eye on..but......

name: Activity Tracker
description:
Keep up with your activities on Strava. 
To use this skill you must have an Strava account. To sign up for an account go to https://www.strava.com.

Supported commands:

Alexa, Ask Activity Tracker .....

• about my last run
Detailed information about your last run

• about my last ride
Detailed information about your last bike ride

• about my total stats
The number of times and distance you've completed in the last month

• to get my achievements
Get the number of your recent achievement
review: useless

name: Georgia Bulldogs
description:
You can listen to live audio of games, podcast episodes and other special features.

Say:
"Play the latest podcast"
"Listen to the game"
"Call the Dawgs"

name: The Great Odin
description: Summon your inner Norseman by asking The Great Odin to sound the Gjallarhorn! Skol Vikings!
review: Nothing happens when I use the phrases given.

name: Daily Golf Briefing
description: Add the Daily Golf Briefing to your Flash Briefing to hear all the latest news in the world of golf, every morning.
review: I like to listen to this each morning but the recording level is so low that I have to turn up my Alexa to hear it and then she is yelling at me until I turn it back down

name: College Football Roster Info
description:
The College Football Roster Info skill lets you get information about any player on any team in the FBS by name or number. Simply ask Alexa about players by using their full name, last name, or number and their team and she will tell you key information about them like their height, weight, class and hometown. 
Note: information is current as of the start of the season, if you find numbers have changed let me know as the teams sometimes shuffle those in the first week or so.
review: If you are very into college football this is great for you if not I'm not sure why you would use it. Give position, home town, and height of current players

name: Golf Lifestyle
description: Golf Lifestyle is an ever growing skill that will allow you to discover some golfing insights that you might not have seen before.
comment heading: Clears up lots of misconceptions about the game!
review: For anyone even thinking about taking up golf, this is a good Alexa skill to enable.

skills-rest: The Rookie's Guide to the NFL
name: The Rookie's Guide to the NFL
description:
The Rookie's Guide to the NFL is your official way to learn about the National Football League. Become an expert by asking about the rules, penalties, scoring plays, commentator lingo, previous Super Bowls, team formations, and more.

After enabling the skill, say 'Open NFL' or 'Launch NFL' to use The Rookie's Guide.

Once you've opened the skill, you can say things like:
-What is defensive pass interference?
-How many players are on a team?
-Who won Super Bowl 35?
-What's the difference between a running back and a wide receiver?
-Tell me about the Music City Miracle
-How tall is Aaron Rodgers?
-What does ‘move the chains’ mean?
Or, just say 'Surprise me' to hear a new definition

If you get stuck within the skill, say 'Alexa, what does this skill do?' to hear more options.
review: I love using this feature on my Amazon Alexa. The experience is really pleasurable and worked seamelessly for me. It really does know the answer to every question! I also enjoyed the unique voice, different from the typical Alexa voice. The Rookie’s Guide is great for getting answers to questions about play calls and penalties that I’ve been confused about in the past.

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to get: 
– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– your team’s injury/bye status. 
– player scores and injury updates.
All without ever putting your hands on the ball.

——

description:
Are you a huge WWE fan? Then you need the Daily DDT Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on the WWE. 
Daily DDT is a WWE site brought to you by the FanSided Network dedicated to providing top-notch news, views and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.

name: Tomahawk Take
description:
Are you a huge Atlanta Braves fan? Then you need the Tomahawk Take Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on your Braves. 

Tomahawk Take is the Atlanta Braves news and opinions site brought to you by the FanSided Network. Tomahawk Take is dedicated to providing top-notch Braves news, views, and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.
review: Since it is the off-season and the Braves are not making headlines every day, is there a way you can adjust the number of headlines you want to hear? That way, you could change it again once the season starts

name: Teams Quiz
description:
Teams Quiz is an interactive game that challenges your knowledge of sports teams and the cities that they belong to. You have choices from a  variety of sports including hockey, baseball, basketball and football. 

The game offers clues through answer choices to help you guess the names of the cities or teams. If you are newbie to sports teams, do not despair - there is plenty of assistance built in.

To start the game simply say "Alexa, launch teams quiz". The game then will ask you to pick a sport of your choice - hockey, baseball, basketball or football. Once you make your choice, it then dives into the teams for that sport. You can ask for help, switch to a different sport or stop the game at any time.

Have fun learning your teams and their cities!
comment heading: Might be nice to update the answers
review: FYI - the Rams don't play in St Louis.  You are wrong Alexa, not me!

skills-rest: How many days since Michigan has beaten Ohio State
name: How many days since Michigan has beaten Ohio State
description:
The purpose of this skill is to inform users of how many days it has been since the Michigan Wolverines last beat the Ohio State Buckeyes in college football. At the time of writing, this skill is accurate in calculating the difference in days since the last time Michigan beat Ohio State.

Uttering one of the example phrases listed should trigger Alexa to tell you how long it has been in days since Michigan last beat Ohio State.
comment heading: Puts a smile on my face
review: It puts a smile on my face every time I hear the answer, but I do wish the question could be simplified. 5 stars otherwise.

name: 92.3 The Fan

review: Was ok but now not working....

Follow us on Twitter: @CFB_NewsBrief
review: The news is very out of date- particularly for this time of year when there is so much news to report all day every day.  Very disappointing.

review: Who does x play next/last is pretty much all it has. Needs toimprove

name: Benchmark WOD by WIKIWOD
description:
Benchmark and Hero series workouts are used to track the performance of the CrossFit athletes.

There's three main categories of these workouts: Girls, New Girls, and Hero WODs. The total number of these workouts is over one hundred.

Since athletes do not perform these WODs as often, it is difficult to remember all of them.

With Benchmark WOD skill by WIKIWOD, you don't have to memorize these workouts anymore.

Simply ask Alexa "What is Grace?", or "What is Chelsea workout?"  Alexa will tell you what this WOD consists of.

More about Benchmark and Hero series workouts on www.wikiwod.com
review: Doesn't work

name: Roll Tide Roll
description:
We have always loved Alexa and now we know why... she’s a Crimson Tide fan!
Roll Tide Roll is a perfect game-day addition for your Amazon Device!
Impress your friends, family, & coworkers while showing off that Crimson Tide Pride!
review: I mean really perfect!

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.
review: Is a really good app, in my personal opinion great I recommend you download and use this app

description:
Yankees Baseball Trivia was written by a long-time fan of the New York Yankees. This skill is fun to play during the long winter months when there is no baseball and you long to hear "Play Ball". Or while waiting for the game to start on the TV.

Yankees Baseball Trivia is great for the entire family! Play with or against each other and see who really knows their Yankees.

New trivia is constantly being added to the skill, so keep coming back and playing.

If you have questions or comments please let us know:
Steve@Dwilsys.com

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Major League Baseball or the New York Yankees. This is a fan created game.

name: Coach Harbaugh
description:
Need to get fired up? Of course you don't - you are already attacking today with an enthusiasm unknown to mankind. But how about having your own personal Jim Harbaugh to entertain you on game day? Or on Mondays. Or every single morning while you wash down your steak breakfast with whole milk. 

You can say:
1. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh for a quote
2. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh to play "The Victors"
3. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh WHO'S GOT IT BETTER THAN US!?

Please note that this skill is not affiliated with the University of Michigan in any way. I'm just a fan with the constitutional right to share Jim Harbaugh's wisdom with you.

Special thanks to Sibish Basheer for making this possible.
comment heading: Best skill in the history of the world
review: Makes me fell warm and happy inside :)

name: Baseball Reference
description:
Welcome to the Baseball Reference Alexa application. This application makes finding out leaders in certain statistics as easy as just asking. As of right now this app can only return top ranking and you cannot make request by specific players or team statistics.

Users are able to request a multitude of different statistics that can be further specified by rank (1-10), top amount (top two, top three, top four, etc.) year (1871 - present), and league (All of Baseball, National League or American League). 

Here are some initial example requests:
-------------------------------------------
Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who is third in the National League in home runs.

Who leads the league in doubles?

Who lead the American League in wins in nineteen eighty six?

Who is the oldest player in the league?

Alexa, ask Baseball Reference, in nineteen ninety nine, who lead the league in home runs?

Who was top three in strikeouts?

Who was tenth in wins in the National League in nineteen seventy two
-------------------------------------------

Another feature available to users is that after a user makes a successful request and are prompted to ask another question, a user can build upon their previous request.


For Example:
-------------------------------------------
User Requests - "Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who was second in the National League in hits in nineteen eighty three"

Alexa Responds - "Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits in 1983."

The user can now request a few things:

- Next -
User Requests - "Who was next?"
Alexa Responds -  "Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits in 1983."

- Previous -
User Requests - "Who was previous?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983 ."

- Rank -
User Requests - "Who was sixth?"
Alexa Responds -  "Dickie Thon was sixth in the National League with 177 Hits In 1983."

- Top -
User Requests - "Who was top three?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983. Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits In 1983. Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits In 1983."
-------------------------------------------

Statistics To Request
-----------------------
// Hitting
Singles
Doubles
Triples
Home runs
RBIs
Runs
Stolen bases
Caught stealing
Batting average
Hits
Wins above replacement
Slugging percentage
Extra base hits
Total bases
On base percentage
Walks
Intentional walks
Sacrifice flies
At bats per home run
Grounded into double plays

// Pitching
Earned Run Average
Strikeouts
Strikes per walk
Strikeouts per nine innings
WHIP
Wins
Shutouts
Saves
Innings Pitches

//Misc
Oldest Player
Youngest Player

If you have any questions or comments regarding this application please feel free to reach out to us at ottomanellibaseball@gmail.com.
review: I'm not sure who programmed this but it has no info. It says it has data back to 1871 but when asked who won they must Cy Young could not answer. Could not answer who was MVP in 1983. Simple stuff

name: Surf Checker
description:
THE ROCK WAS ADDED AND MOST CALIFORNIA AND HAWAII SURF SPOTS ARE AVAILABLE!

Let Alexa give you the surf report for most California and Hawaii surf spots.  Also for each surf spot, let Alexa also give you the tide report, the water temperature and let you know when is the best day to surf for the upcoming week.

Using the streamlined commands structure, getting the surf report information for several spots is simple and easy.  

Here are examples to try: 
 
"Alexa, Ask Surf Checker for Salt Creek on Tuesday"
"When is the best day to surf Lowers"
"What is the tide report for San Clemente State Beach on Wednesday"
"What is the water temperature at Lihaina Harbor"
"When is the best day to surf Pipeline"

For surf reports, just say the surf spot name for quick results:
For example, just say "Sunset Beach" for the Sunset Beach surf report. Or say, "Sunset Beach on Thursday" to get the report for the upcoming Thursday.        

Alexa also remembers the last surf report you requested so that additional reports do not have to include the spot name.   For example once you ask for a report like:
"What is the surf report for Pismo Beach Pier"

You can get the tide, water temperature, and best day to surf at Pismo Beach Pier by saying:
"What is the tide report" or just "tide report?"
"When is the best day to surf"
"What is the water temperature" or just "water temperature"

If you want to find the tide activity later in the week for Pismo Beach just say:
"Tide report for tomorrow" or "Tide report on Friday"

Listed below are JUST SOME of the surf spots available.  There were too many to list here.  The complete list is at www.surfncircuits.com.  New locations soon!!   If you want your surf spot added please mention it in comment below or at www.surfncircuits.com

description:
Trying to keep score when you're playing baseball can be difficult, so why not use your Alexa and have it keep score for you?  

Roxie is a skill that tracks all of the basic information around a one-on-one pickup game.  Here are different features.

To begin, say "Start Game" and a new game will be initialized.  By default, the games are three innings long, and each player gets ten swings.

You can customize the player names by saying "Change Player One/Two name to <name>".

Say pitch ball and Roxie will track that a pitch was thrown.  Let Roxie know what happened next - either say "Strike, Ball, or Base Hit" and it will track the score.
review: This is awesome!

name: Running Clothes
description:
Wondering what to wear on your next run? 
The Running Clothes Advisor takes the guesswork out of getting dressed for your next outdoor run based on your local weather conditions. This simple guide may prompt you to enable location permissions in your Alexa app. If you do not wish to enable location permissions say, "My Inputs" for your personalized apparel recommendation.

Our exclusive apparel algorithm provides personalized apparel recommendations based on weather conditions and gender. This skill has been optimized with screen support for Echo Show and Echo Spot devices.

After your run, re-open the Running Clothes advisor and select "log my run." You can record your miles ran and how your run went. You can also tell Alexa if her recommendation was too hot or too cold and the algorithm will automatically adjust your recommendations going forward.

If you choose apparel advice based current weather conditions, Alexa will pull temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other weather conditions based on your zip code. Alexa will prompt you for your gender and create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive apparel algorithm. Our exclusive algorithm is based on years of running experience and races including 5K, 10K, 10 Miler, Half Marathon, and Full Marathon distances. Caroline Dunn is a New York City Marathon 2018 Finisher.

If you select running outfit advice based on your inputs, Alexa will ask you for your gender, temperature, weather conditions (sunny, windy, cloudy, or raining), and your run intensity (easy run, or race), to create a personalized recommendation based on our exclusive algorithm. Feel free to adjust based on your personal preference. This is only intended to be a guide.

Disclaimer: Please consult a physician before beginning a new workout program.

Created by: Caroline Dunn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinedunn/
https://twitter.com/thecarolinedunn
https://www.instagram.com/thecarolinedunn/
http://carolinedunn.org/
http://alexadevgroup.com/
review: my wife and i are not runners. but will use this occasionally when taking high intensity walks and farm work. thank you

name: StatMuse
description:
StatMuse lets you explore sports statistics, schedules and scores in a whole new way, straight from your favorite players and personalities. Say "Alexa, ask StatMuse who has the most career receiving yards?" and hear Jerry Rice tell you about his record. Then try "Who had the most touchdowns last season?" to hear from David Johnson. Ask "When are the Falcons playing next?" to have Devonta Freeman give you his game schedule.



StatMuse provides instant answers to your NBA, NFL, MLB & NHL questions and features the authentic voices of Peyton Manning, Le'Veon Bell, Drew Brees, Terrell Owens, Jerry Rice and other players, plus Scott Van Pelt and Joe Buck. StatMuse is the officially licensed AI of the NFL Players Association.

Start by asking:
"Alexa, open Statmuse…"

“How did the Eagles do?”
"Who had the most passing yards in a season?"
After hearing Drew Brees answer, ask "Where did you go to college?" or "How many touchdowns did you have last season?"

"Who won the World Series in 1945?"
"Which pitcher had the most strikeouts last year?"
After hearing the answer, ask "What is his career ERA?"

"How did Steph Curry do last season?"
“Who do the Rockets play this week?”

“What hockey games are on tonight?”
“Tell me about the Golden Knights.”
StatMuse has comprehensive stats going back to 1947 for the NBA, 1920 for the NFL, 1876 for MLB and 1917 for the NHL.

Here are just a few of the stats now available to you, instantly: https://www.statmuse.com/getting-started/examples
comment heading: A must have for any sports fan!!!
review: Incredible! Best sports skill yet. Hope it will soon expand to other sports like PGA and NHL, but it's awesome just like it is!

name: Fantasy Football
description: Retrieve fantasy football news, player updates, weekly sit/start advice, draft advice, and trade analysis directly from Fantasy Football Nerd.
comment heading: More of a Football news source rather than much to do about Fantasy Football
review:
This is an Echo front end to the Fantasy Football Nerd website. This uses "Nerd Rank" technology to crowd source ratings. They're good enough to be quotes as "the Cliffs Notes of the Industry" by The Washington Post in 2009.

Ease of Use: 3 out of 5. It's pretty simple, you can just ask for news, or about a certain player. It was better than I expected with the player names. It did crash once, but it got all the others I tried right. When it reads the general news, it is in several segments. It can get kind of long. It would have been nice if it was split up and you could cycle through them conversationally. Player news is also in segments, but the gap between them is less clear. This can create some confusion as one news update runs into the next. Also, the text comes straight from their site, and occasionally it reads web-links, which is confusing and unhelpful.

Usefulness: 3 out of 5. I know almost nothing about Fantasy Football. But this skill seems more of a Football news source rather than much to do about Fantasy Football. That's great for football fans. I don't know how great that is for Fantasy Football fans. Perhaps it should have been marketed more towards mainstream football enthusiasts.

Novelty: 3 out of 5. It's another "read the news to  you" skill. The news appears to be high quality and relevant for the topic. But it really is just about the news.

Overall: 3 out of 5. It's fairly specific in it's appeal, although, admittedly, football is rather popular. I'd like to see them add in more interaction and connect with the gameplay of Fantasy Football itself. There are several tools on the web site and I think the skill will improve greatly if they integrate those in going forward.

description:
Alphabet Affirmation is a skill to help you upgrade how you feel instantly.  Unlike other affirmation skills which give you a one liner affirmation, the Alphabet Affirmation Skill is designed to take you on a short mental break via reciting a series of affirmative and uplifting words from A to Z that will guarantee a positive feel good distraction from life and brings you back into the positive vibration.


You can say:

"Alexa, open Alphabet Affirmation"

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at (feedback@aialchemy.com). Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, thanks!

Credits:  The "Alphabet Affirmation Skill" is entirely created by "Amir Harouni" and was inspired by the teachings of "Jesse Elder".  Please visit www.JesseElder.com if you are interested in finding out more.

All that positive message about me made feel good, then said yes to again? and another set of positive message affirmations and I felt better ! and a couple of more rounds of that and I am in mega excellent mood ! Absolutely deserves five stars !  David Campbell

description:

Invocation Name - cricket feeds
Just say "Open cricket feeds" or "Start cricket feeds"

To open the feeds for a particular category

Just say "Open category India" or "Open Cricket Feeds for {country}"

For example "Open Cricket Feeds for India"

To mark a particular country as favorite

Just say "mark {Country} as favorite"

for example "mark India as favorite"

To Remove a particular country from favorites

Just say "remove {country} as favorite"

for example "remove India as favorite"

To get supported categories
Just say "list categories" or "get category list"

review: A fun way to keep up with the cubbies.  Love me some dingers!

name: NBA
description:
Welcome to the new NBA Alexa Skill! You can interact with me in several ways:

(1) Open me by saying "Alexa, open NBA." You should always start your conversation with me this way.  This will trigger the welcome menu and tell you how to listen to live NBA action, check scores, and get schedule info. 

After you’ve opened the NBA skill…

(2) **To LISTEN TO A GAME**, tell me “Play the Cavs game" or “Stream the Atlanta game."  Most games have the home and away announcers, just say the team name for the announcers you want and we'll start streaming.  If Alexa has trouble recognizing your team name, be sure and use the city AND team name together, like “Houston Rockets.”

(3) To ask about the SCHEDULE, say “What games are on today?” OR “When do the Warriors play?”  Ask about a specific team to get broadcaster information for upcoming games.  

(4) Ask me about SCORES by saying, “What is the score of the Milwaukee Bucks game?” OR “What are the latest scores?"  

Additionally after opening the skill, you can say things to me like:

Who is playing now?
When do the Celtics play the Lakers?
What time are the Memphis Grizzlies on?
Did the Thunder win on Monday?

**You will need to login from the Alexa companion app with a valid NBA League Pass subscription in order to listen to games.  Visit www.nba.com/leaguepass to sign up today.
review: Only plays the home team of the game no matter what you say. Example: "Alexa, open NBA and play the Washington Wizards." Alexa then proceeds to play the Clippers broadcast of the game and I never even said Clippers.

name: Baseball Reference
description:
Welcome to the Baseball Reference Alexa application. This application makes finding out leaders in certain statistics as easy as just asking. As of right now this app can only return top ranking and you cannot make request by specific players or team statistics.

Users are able to request a multitude of different statistics that can be further specified by rank (1-10), top amount (top two, top three, top four, etc.) year (1871 - present), and league (All of Baseball, National League or American League). 

Here are some initial example requests:
-------------------------------------------
Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who is third in the National League in home runs.

Who leads the league in doubles?

Who lead the American League in wins in nineteen eighty six?

Who is the oldest player in the league?

Alexa, ask Baseball Reference, in nineteen ninety nine, who lead the league in home runs?

Who was top three in strikeouts?

Who was tenth in wins in the National League in nineteen seventy two
-------------------------------------------

Another feature available to users is that after a user makes a successful request and are prompted to ask another question, a user can build upon their previous request.


For Example:
-------------------------------------------
User Requests - "Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who was second in the National League in hits in nineteen eighty three"

Alexa Responds - "Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits in 1983."

The user can now request a few things:

- Next -
User Requests - "Who was next?"
Alexa Responds -  "Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits in 1983."

- Previous -
User Requests - "Who was previous?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983 ."

- Rank -
User Requests - "Who was sixth?"
Alexa Responds -  "Dickie Thon was sixth in the National League with 177 Hits In 1983."

- Top -
User Requests - "Who was top three?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983. Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits In 1983. Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits In 1983."
-------------------------------------------

Statistics To Request
-----------------------
// Hitting
Singles
Doubles
Triples
Home runs
RBIs
Runs
Stolen bases
Caught stealing
Batting average
Hits
Wins above replacement
Slugging percentage
Extra base hits
Total bases
On base percentage
Walks
Intentional walks
Sacrifice flies
At bats per home run
Grounded into double plays

// Pitching
Earned Run Average
Strikeouts
Strikes per walk
Strikeouts per nine innings
WHIP
Wins
Shutouts
Saves
Innings Pitches

//Misc
Oldest Player
Youngest Player

If you have any questions or comments regarding this application please feel free to reach out to us at ottomanellibaseball@gmail.com.

name: Big Ten Network Football News
description: The flash briefing skill will read the Big Ten Network's football news.
comment heading: Useful but will turn off casual fans.
review:
Some skills feature fully produced and dynamic content (BBC, ESPN, etc..), which is what most people are looking for. This is essentially an RSS-feed that is dictated to you by Alexa.

While her natural language UI is good enough for daily interaction, it’s simply not good enough for long-form “reading.” During shows like this, it lands squarely in the uncanny valley — her cadence feels both slow and rushed — and eventually can become grating.

If you want up-to-the-minute info on BIG10, it’s good... as long as you can stand listening to Alexa bark at you.

name: Baseball Odds
description:
Baseball Odds gives the money line odds for up to 10 MLB games currently on the roster for the next 24 hours.  Baseball Odds is updated hourly for all games, unless they are currently in play, or have been played, then information will not be given. Baseball Odds provides the "MoneyLine" odds for both teams and the "Total" Over/Under. This information is taken from an average of online sports books and is not guaranteed to be accurate.
Baseball Odds is sponsored by TheVegasBook.win
review: Love my Giants, but will go where I can make the money. Great Skill!

name: ESPN
description:
Get your sports radio fix with the ESPN skill. From Mike and Mike to Dan Le Batard and Stu Gotz, this skill brings you live ESPN Radio, several ESPN affiliate stations, and hourly news updates.  

Say, "Tell me the news," "Play the radio," or ask for your local ESPN radio station to access the best in sports radio content.

Supported radio stations include:
- ESPN Radio
- ESPN Deportes Radio
- ESPN Chicago (WMVP 1000 AM)
- ESPN Los Angeles (KSPN 710 AM)
- ESPN New York (WEPN 98.7 FM)
- ESPN Deportes New York (WEPN 1050 AM)
review: It does exactly what I want it to do. I can't ask for more than that.

name: Baseball BASIQs
description:
Baseball BASIQs helps develop your players' baseball IQ. 

Ask Alexa for a "situation" for any position and she will give you a setup (runners on base, # of outs) and tell you where and how the ball is hit.  She then takes a brief pause before explaining what should be done in the given situation.

An example would be:
 - "You are playing shortstop"
 - "There are runners on First and Third"
 - "There is one out"
 - "There is a hard-ground ball to Second Baseman"
 - "What is your play?"
 - "Your play is to hustle to Second Base to take the toss from Second Baseman for one out and then make quick throw to First Base to complete the double play!"

Baseball BASIQs contains over 7,000 situations to learn from! Give us a try today! 

Check us out at www.BASIQs.com

name: PGA TOUR
description: We can make it: Keep up to date on the latest scores from every PGA TOUR event throughout the season.  Ask Alexa for the latest leaderboard or get the score of your favorite player.  See more information here: https://www.pgatour.com/products/voiceassistant.html
review: Works perfect, don't have any complaints at all.

name: Arizona Sports 98.7 FM - Starting Five
description: Listen to Arizona Sports 98.7 FM's Doug and Wolf start each morning with the five biggest stories in sports.
comment heading: It only announces the starting five.
review: More content would be great.

skills-rest: The Rookie's Guide to the NFL
name: The Rookie's Guide to the NFL
description:
The Rookie's Guide to the NFL is your official way to learn about the National Football League. Become an expert by asking about the rules, penalties, scoring plays, commentator lingo, previous Super Bowls, team formations, and more.

After enabling the skill, say 'Open NFL' or 'Launch NFL' to use The Rookie's Guide.

Once you've opened the skill, you can say things like:
-What is defensive pass interference?
-How many players are on a team?
-Who won Super Bowl 35?
-What's the difference between a running back and a wide receiver?
-Tell me about the Music City Miracle
-How tall is Aaron Rodgers?
-What does ‘move the chains’ mean?
Or, just say 'Surprise me' to hear a new definition

If you get stuck within the skill, say 'Alexa, what does this skill do?' to hear more options.
review: Thanks, NFL - this is already incredibly helpful for the wife. Can we have it in Spanish too?

name: Calling the Hogs
description:
Have Alexa call the razorbacks hogs by saying

"Alexa, start calling the hogs"

Optionally "and let's beat the {mascot}" or "and let's beat {college}"  can be included at the end of the launch command.

"Alexa, Start calling the hogs and beat the bulldogs"
"Alexa, Start calling the hogs and beat Alabama"
review: How about playing a hog call from a game?

name: Aravaipa Running
description: Get upcoming Aravaipa Running events, group runs, and trail tips.

name: ESPN Radio (via TuneIn)
description: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest sports news from the ESPN Radio SportsCenter.
comment heading: Best place 2 get info on player's
review: Espn radio is the s*** there on point with players injuries ect...

name: ESPN Radio (via TuneIn)
description: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest sports news from the ESPN Radio SportsCenter.
comment heading: Why do you have to yell?
review: Yep volume adjustment needed!

name: Beat Navy
description: Do you miss asking plebes how many and a butt days until we Beat Navy? Alexa knows you do.
review: Most useful Alexa skill ever published.

name: ESPN Flash Briefing
description:
Want to stay up to date on the latest sports news? From Aaron Rodgers to Zlatan Ibrahimović, your ESPN Flash Briefings bring you the hottest stories in sports, updated throughout the day.
 
Add ESPN to your Flash Briefing, then say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" to tune in.

name: Yahoo Fantasy Football
description:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football head-to-head leagues to the Alexa Skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to get: 
– an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– your team’s injury/bye status. 
– player scores and injury updates.
All without ever putting your hands on the ball.

——

NOTE: This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em.
review: Easy to use

name: Steelers Fan
description:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Steelers by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Steelers.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Steelers Fan how are the Steelers doing? 

Alexa, ask Steelers Fan who do the Steelers play next?

Alexa, ask Steelers Fan Terry Bradshaw (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Steelers:


Alexa, ask Steelers Fan to tell me some trivia about the Steelers. 

Alexa, ask Steelers Fan how many Super Bowls have the Steelers won?
review: Works great for me. Using it in the kitchen during Ravens game, plus the fun facts are a great compliment.

name: Rock Chalk Jayhawk
description:
We have always loved Alexa and now we know why... she’s a Jayhawk fan!
Rock Chalk Jayhawk is a perfect game-day addition for your Amazon Device!
Impress your friends, family, & coworkers while showing off that Jayhawk Pride!

name: Daily Alphabet Affirmation
description:
Alphabet Affirmation is a skill to help you upgrade how you feel instantly.  Unlike other affirmation skills which give you a one liner affirmation, the Alphabet Affirmation Skill is designed to take you on a short mental break via reciting a series of affirmative and uplifting words from A to Z that will guarantee a positive feel good distraction from life and brings you back into the positive vibration.


You can say:

"Alexa, open Alphabet Affirmation"
"Alexa, start Alphabet Affirmation"
"Alexa, start Alphabet Affirmation"

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at (feedback@aialchemy.com). Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, thanks!

Credits:  The "Alphabet Affirmation Skill" is entirely created by "Amir Harouni" and was inspired by the teachings of "Jesse Elder".  Please visit www.JesseElder.com if you are interested in finding out more.
review: I love the idea of this, but it would be better if Alexa didn't read off the words so fast.

name: 9 Cats
description:
Alexa will provide past and present statistics along with advanced metrics derived from NBA players using the Yahoo Fantasy Sports API

How To Use:
1. Name of a current NBA player who has played in at least one game
2. Valid basketball statistic (See list below)
3. Year of an NBA season ranging from 2001 – Present

Quick Example Phrases:
Alexa, ask 9 Cats Lebron James, season stats, 2010
Alexa, ask 9 Cats John Wall, assists per game, 2011
Alexa, ask 9 Cats Russell Westbrook, total rebounds, twenty twelve
Alexa, ask 9 Cats Anthony Davis, blocks per game, twenty thirteen
Alexa, ask 9 Cats James Harden, free throw attempts, twenty fourteen

Basketball Statistics:
Assists
Assists Per Game
Average Stats
Blocks
Blocks Per Game
Defensive Rebounds

Field Goal Attempts
Field Goal Attempts Per Game
Field Goal Percentage
Field Goals Made

Fouls Per Game
Free Throw Attempts

Free Throw Percentage

Games Played

Minutes Played
Offensive Rebounds

Personal Fouls

Three Point Percentage

Three Pointers Made Per Game

name: Fantasy Football News
description:
Get a flash briefing from Let's Talk Fantasy Football on the latest NFL and Fantasy Football news.

The feed includes NFL & Fantasy Football Headlines only and will give you a brief overview of what's going on in the football world.

On Sunday mornings you can hear all of the injury news to make sure your lineup is ready for to win big!

Some of the NFL News you can expect includes: 
- Coach highlights.
- NFL & Fantasy football relevant injuries.
- Insider updates from those close to the NFL Teams.
- Trade rumors, training camp cuts and other roster changes. 

With the Let's Talk Fantasy Football News Alexa Skill and all of our other fantasy football alexa skills, you can always talk fantasy football.
comment heading: Worth checking out for all Fantasy Football fans.
review: It's a flash briefing that does exactly what you expect! News preview, always updated and great quick hits. The voice is the usual Alexa voice you hear on TV and everywhere, so don't sweat it!

name: Dallas Cowboys (Official)
description:
The Official Dallas Cowboys Alexa Skill.

Say "Alexa, play Dallas Cowboys" to hear news, updates and headlines.
review: In order to use this, one has to subscribe to Tune In Live. But that’s not in the description of the skill. Very disappointing.

name: Mt. Bachelor Update
description: Stay up to date with what is going on at Mt. Bachelor. With over 4,300 acres of lift-accessible terrain, you won’t want to pass up a trip to the ski resort with the highest skiable elevation in all of Oregon and Washington! Mt. Bachelor, located on the eastern flanks of Oregon’s Central Cascades, is known for its light, dry snow, diverse terrain, family-friendliness and long seasons.

name: Coach Harbaugh
description:
Need to get fired up? Of course you don't - you are already attacking today with an enthusiasm unknown to mankind. But how about having your own personal Jim Harbaugh to entertain you on game day? Or on Mondays. Or every single morning while you wash down your steak breakfast with whole milk. 

You can say:
1. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh for a quote
2. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh to play "The Victors"
3. Alexa, ask Coach Harbaugh WHO'S GOT IT BETTER THAN US!?

Please note that this skill is not affiliated with the University of Michigan in any way. I'm just a fan with the constitutional right to share Jim Harbaugh's wisdom with you.

Special thanks to Sibish Basheer for making this possible.
review: Love it!

name: 106.7 The Fan Sports Flash
description: Your latest DC sports news and info from 106.7 The Fan

review: love this nice little workout, i use it every morning to get in touch with my breath and get some leg exercise. would love to see more routines added!

name: Arsenal
description:
Get the most out of every match day with Arsenal FC’s official skill. With full support for pre-match build-up, live commentary and post-match analysis you can keep up to date with all the action. 
 
To get started, simply say "Alexa, open Arsenal."
 
Options include: 

Pre Match:
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the match preview.” - receive an overview of the upcoming match.
“Alexa, ask Arsenal who’s injured?” - find out who is injured.
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the team lineup.” - available approximately one hour before kick-off.
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the pre-match build up.” - listen to the official pre-match commentary, available around 30 minutes before kick-off.

During Match:
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the live commentary.” - listen to the official match commentary, available during a game.
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the match summary.” - find out the score, bookings, injuries and substitutions.
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the score.” - learn how we’re getting on in-play.

Post Match:
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the post match analysis.” - listen to the official post-match commentary, available for around 30 minutes after the final whistle. 
“Alexa, ask Arsenal for the match report.” - hear the official Arsenal opinion of the game.
review: Works great. Even the live commentary. Not sure what the others are complaining about. Maybe it is region blocked for them or giving the wrong commands maybe. But I love it.

name: PGA TOUR
description: We can make it: Keep up to date on the latest scores from every PGA TOUR event throughout the season.  Ask Alexa for the latest leaderboard or get the score of your favorite player.  See more information here: https://www.pgatour.com/products/voiceassistant.html

name: Baseball Reference
description:
Welcome to the Baseball Reference Alexa application. This application makes finding out leaders in certain statistics as easy as just asking. As of right now this app can only return top ranking and you cannot make request by specific players or team statistics.

Users are able to request a multitude of different statistics that can be further specified by rank (1-10), top amount (top two, top three, top four, etc.) year (1871 - present), and league (All of Baseball, National League or American League). 

Here are some initial example requests:
-------------------------------------------
Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who is third in the National League in home runs.

Who leads the league in doubles?

Who lead the American League in wins in nineteen eighty six?

Who is the oldest player in the league?

Alexa, ask Baseball Reference, in nineteen ninety nine, who lead the league in home runs?

Who was top three in strikeouts?

Who was tenth in wins in the National League in nineteen seventy two
-------------------------------------------

Another feature available to users is that after a user makes a successful request and are prompted to ask another question, a user can build upon their previous request.


For Example:
-------------------------------------------
User Requests - "Alexa, ask Baseball Reference who was second in the National League in hits in nineteen eighty three"

Alexa Responds - "Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits in 1983."

The user can now request a few things:

- Next -
User Requests - "Who was next?"
Alexa Responds -  "Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits in 1983."

- Previous -
User Requests - "Who was previous?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983 ."

- Rank -
User Requests - "Who was sixth?"
Alexa Responds -  "Dickie Thon was sixth in the National League with 177 Hits In 1983."

- Top -
User Requests - "Who was top three?"
Alexa Responds -  "Jose Cruz and Andre Dawson were tied for first in the National League with 189 Hits In 1983. Rafael Ramirez was second in the National League with 185 Hits In 1983. Al Oliver was third in the National League with 184 Hits In 1983."
-------------------------------------------

Statistics To Request
-----------------------
// Hitting
Singles
Doubles
Triples
Home runs
RBIs
Runs
Stolen bases
Caught stealing
Batting average
Hits
Wins above replacement
Slugging percentage
Extra base hits
Total bases
On base percentage
Walks
Intentional walks
Sacrifice flies
At bats per home run
Grounded into double plays

// Pitching
Earned Run Average
Strikeouts
Strikes per walk
Strikeouts per nine innings
WHIP
Wins
Shutouts
Saves
Innings Pitches

//Misc
Oldest Player
Youngest Player

If you have any questions or comments regarding this application please feel free to reach out to us at ottomanellibaseball@gmail.com.
review: Great app, easy to access leaderboards, would be nice to add player cards.

skills-rest: Hoosier Sound-Off: IU Sports News by Hoosier Sound
name: Hoosier Sound-Off: IU Sports News by Hoosier Sound
description: Hoosier Sound-Off is a regular news update of the most important Indiana sports news from The Hoosier Sound. Hosted by Noah Freeman, this short flash briefing will include short updates from around the Indiana University athletic department for a variety of sports.
review: These guys know their stuff big time. Definitely worth a listen. They're also open to feedback which is great.

name: Utah Fishing
description:
Are you headed out the door to your favorite Utah fishing spot and need to know what the fishing is like? Utah Fishing gives you the most up-to-date fishing report including: status, species, and full report!
Open the skill by saying, “Alexa, open Utah Fishing.” Next, simply ask for the specific fishing spot. You can say, “Alexa, what’s the fishing report for Strawberry Reservoir?” Or, without opening the skill, simply ask Alexa for the report all in one command. You can say, “Alexa, ask Utah Fishing for the fishing report at Lake Powell.”
If at any point you need help simply ask Alexa for possible commands by saying, “Alexa help.”
For an interactive fishing reports map visit: https://wildlife.utah.gov/hotspots/
review: Detailed information for the spots I fish. Fun to see what is going on at other areas.

name: Who's on First?
description:
Who's on first? What's on second? For the first time ever, hear the world famous Abbott & Costello baseball themed comedy routine spoken by a virtual assistant. Play ball!

If you enjoyed this skill, please tell a friend and remember to leave it a 5 star review in your Alexa app. Thanks in advance!!!
review: It seems to be broken.  No matter what I do, it will not play the routine.  It just plays the intro music.😭
